classes.name: DragSource
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, a BBjControl implements the DragSource interface if the user can specify drag actions and types. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_DragSource/interface_dragsource.htm)

classes.name: TextControl
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, all text-based BBjControls implement the TextControl interface. When spell checking is enabled, the text control monitors the user's typing, underlines misspelled words, and adds a popup menu with options to correct spelling mistakes. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol.htm)

methods.name: setSpellChecked
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method specifies whether a text control should be spell checked. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_setspellchecked.htm)

methods.name: isSpellChecked
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns whether spell checking is currently active in a text control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_isspellchecked.htm)

methods.name: setSpellCheckLanguage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this specifies the language that should be used to spell check a text control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_setspellchecklanguage.htm)

methods.name: setLocale
methods.docu: In BBj 9.0 and higher, this specifies the user interface language for a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_setlocale.htm)

methods.name: getLocale
methods.docu: In BBj 9.0 and higher, this method returns the user interface language for a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_getlocale.htm)

methods.name: setSpellCheckColor
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the color of the jagged underline that indicates misspelled word. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_setspellcheckcolor.htm)

methods.name: addWord
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method adds a word to the server-side custom dictionary file, and marks the word as not misspelled in the spell checked text control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/interface_textcontrol_addword.htm)

methods.name: setLeftMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method sets the width of the inside left margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setLeftMargin.htm)

methods.name: setRightMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method sets the width of the inside left margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setRightMargin.htm)

methods.name: setTopMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method sets the width of the inside top margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setTopMargin.htm)

methods.name: setBottomMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method sets the width of the inside bottom margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setBottomMargin.htm)

methods.name: getLeftMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the inside left margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getLeftMargin.htm)

methods.name: getRightMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the inside right margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getRightMargin.htm)

methods.name: getTopMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the inside top margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getTopMargin.htm)

methods.name: getBottomMargin
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the inside bottom margin of a text control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getBottomMargin.htm)

methods.name: getDisabledTextColor
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the text color of a text 
 control when it is disabled[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getDisabledTextColor.htm)

methods.name: setDisabledTextColor
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method sets the text color of a text control 
 when it is disabled[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setDisabledTextColor.htm)

methods.name: setPlaceholder
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the placeholder text to be shown when the text control is empty. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setPlaceholder.htm)

methods.name: getPlaceholder
methods.docu:
In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the placeholder text to be shown 
when the text control is empty.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getPlaceholder.htm)

methods.name: getPlaceholderColor
methods.docu:
In BBj 17.0 and higher, this method returns 
the color of the placeholder text to be shown when the text control is 
empty.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_getPlaceholderColor.htm)

methods.name: setPlaceholderColor
methods.docu: In BBj 17.0 and higher, this method sets the color of the placeholder text to be shown when the text control is empty. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextControl/Interface_TextControl_setPlaceholderColor.htm)

classes.name: BBjInputD
classes.docu:
In BBj 4.00 and higher, the BBjInputD object provides methods for manipulating 
 a GUI date control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd.htm)

methods.name: setValue
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method sets the value of the BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setvalue.htm)

methods.name: getValue
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method returns the value of a BBjInputD control as a Julian date. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_getvalue.htm)

methods.name: setLocale
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method sets the locale for the BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setlocale.htm)

methods.name: getLocale
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method returns the locale of the BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_getlocale.htm)

methods.name: setShowWeeks
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method sets whether to display week numbers in the popup calendar associated with this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setshowweeks.htm)

methods.name: getShowWeeks
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjInputD popup calendar will show week numbers. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_getshowweeks.htm)

methods.name: setPlusMinus
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method specifies the keys used to scan forward and backward through dates in this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setplusminus.htm)

methods.name: getPlusMinus
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the keys used to scan forward and backward through dates in this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_getplusminus.htm)

methods.name: isValid
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method returns whether the text in the BBjInputD control is a valid date. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_isvalid.htm)

methods.name: calendar
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method pops up a calendar dialog attached to the BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_calendar.htm)

methods.name: setCalendarSize
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method sets the size of the popup calendar associated with this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setcalendarsize.htm)

methods.name: setWeekdayColor
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this BBjInputD method sets the color used for weekdays in the popup calendar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setweekdaycolor.htm)

methods.name: getWeekdayColor
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method sets the color for the popup calendar associated with this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_getweekdaycolor.htm)

methods.name: setWeekendColor
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this BBjInputD method sets the color for weekend days in the popup calendar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_setweekendcolor.htm)

methods.name: getWeekendColor
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method returns the weekend color for the popup calendar associated with this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_getweekendcolor.htm)

methods.name: setTodayColor
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this BBjInputD method sets the color for the current date in the popup calendar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_settodaycolor.htm)

methods.name: getTodayColor
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method returns the today color for the popup calendar associated with this BBjInputD control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputd/bbjinputd_gettodaycolor.htm)

classes.name: BBjStandardGrid
classes.docu: A BBjStandardGrid provides methods for manipulating a standard grid control in BBj. For Data Aware grids see BBjDataAwareGrid. The BBjStandardGrid extends the BBjGrid object and therefore implements all methods in the BBjGrid. A BBjStandardGrid can be converted to a BBjDataAwareGrid using the method BBjStandardGrid::convertToDataAware. After conversion, the BBjStandardGrid object is no longer valid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid.htm)

methods.name: clear
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes all restore, images, related, text, column and row header, and selection data from the grid in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clear.htm)

methods.name: clear
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes all restore, images, related, text, column and row header, and selection data from the grid in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clear.htm)

methods.name: clearColumnHeader
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, removes all data from the grid column header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearColumnHeader.htm)

methods.name: clearColumnHeader
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, removes all data from the grid column header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearColumnHeader.htm)

methods.name: clearGrid
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method is deprecated.
Use BBjStandardGrid::clear instead. Removes all data from the cells in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_cleargrid.htm)

methods.name: clearImage
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes images in grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid, leaving header images intact. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearImage.htm)

methods.name: clearImage
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes images in grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid, leaving header images intact. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearImage.htm)

methods.name: clearMainGrid
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method is deprecated.
Use clear(), clearImage(), clearRelated(), clearRestore(), and/or clearText() instead. Removes all data from the main grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid, leaving headers intact. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_clearmaingrid.htm)

methods.name: clearRelated
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes related data in grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearRelated.htm)

methods.name: clearRelated
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes related data in grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearRelated.htm)

methods.name: clearRestore
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes restore text from grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearRestore.htm)

methods.name: clearRestore
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes restore text from grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearRestore.htm)

methods.name: clearRowHeader
methods.docu: Removes all data from the grid row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearRowHeader.htm)

methods.name: clearRowHeader
methods.docu: Removes all data from the grid row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearRowHeader.htm)

methods.name: clearText
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes display text from grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid, leaving headers intact. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearText.htm)

methods.name: clearText
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method removes display text from grid cells in the BBjStandardGrid, leaving headers intact. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/BBjStandardGrid_clearText.htm)

methods.name: convertToDataAware
methods.docu: Converts a BBjStandardGrid to a BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_converttodataaware.htm)

methods.name: deleteColumn
methods.docu: Deletes a column from the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_deletecolumn.htm)

methods.name: getCellHasQuery
methods.docu: In BBj 8.0 and higher, this returns whether a BBjStandardGrid cell has an associated query button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcellhasquery.htm)

methods.name: getCellListControl
methods.docu: Returns the list control for a BBjStandardGrid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcelllistcontrol.htm)

methods.name: getCellListSelection
methods.docu: In BBj 2.04 and higher, this method returns the list selection for a list control in a BBjStandardGrid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcelllistselection.htm)

methods.name: getCellRelated
methods.docu: Returns the "related" text associated with a cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcellrelated.htm)

methods.name: getCellRestore
methods.docu: Returns the restore value for a cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcellrestore.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHasQuery
methods.docu: In BBj 8.0 and higher, this returns whether all cells in the specified BBjStandardGrid column have associated query buttons. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcolumnhasquery.htm)

methods.name: getColumnListControl
methods.docu: Returns the list control for a BBjStandardGrid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcolumnlistcontrol.htm)

methods.name: getColumnListSelection
methods.docu: Returns the list control for a BBjStandardGrid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getcolumnlistselection.htm)

methods.name: getHasRowHeader
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjStandardGrid has a row header. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_gethasrowheader.htm)

methods.name: getInputNCommaCharacter
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the character that InputN style cells will display as their 'thousands' separator. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getinputncommacharacter.htm)

methods.name: getInputNDotCharacter
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method the character that InputN style cells will display as their decimal separator. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getinputndotcharacter.htm)

methods.name: getInputNUseEditCommas
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns an indication of whether InputN style cells will display a character at each 'thousands' position. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getinputnuseeditcommas.htm)

methods.name: getMaxColumns
methods.docu: Returns the maximum number of columns allowed in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getmaxcolumns.htm)

methods.name: getMaxRows
methods.docu: Returns the maximum number of rows allowed in a BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getmaxrows.htm)

methods.name: getRowFont
methods.docu: Returns the default font of a row in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowfont.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderAlignment
methods.docu: Returns the alignment of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderalignment.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderBackColor
methods.docu: Returns the default background color of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderCellAlignment
methods.docu: Returns the alignment of a row header cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheadercellalignment.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderCellBackColor
methods.docu: Returns the background color for a row header cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheadercellbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderCellForeColor
methods.docu: Returns the foreground color of a row header cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheadercellforecolor.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderCellStyle
methods.docu: Returns the style of a row header cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheadercellstyle.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderCellText
methods.docu: Returns the text displayed in a row header cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheadercelltext.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderCellVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the vertical alignment of a row header cell in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheadercellverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderFont
methods.docu: Returns the default font of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderfont.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderForeColor
methods.docu: Returns the default foreground color of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderforecolor.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderStyle
methods.docu: Returns the default style of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderstyle.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this returns the vertical alignment of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeaderWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the row header in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowheaderwidth.htm)

methods.name: getRowModelIndexFromViewIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this BBjStandardGrid method maps the view index of a row to the model index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowmodelindexfromviewindex.htm)

methods.name: getRowViewIndexFromModelIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this BBjStandardGrid method maps the model index of a row to the view index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getrowviewindexfrommodelindex.htm)

methods.name: getSortByMultipleColumns
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this BBjStandardGrid method returns an indication of whether this grid sorts by multiple columns. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getsortbymultiplecolumns.htm)

methods.name: getUpdateCached
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjStandardGrid sends table update events. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_getupdatecached.htm)

methods.name: insertColumn
methods.docu: Inserts a column into the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_insertcolumn.htm)

methods.name: insertRow
methods.docu: Inserts a row into the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_insertrow.htm)

methods.name: isCellEditable
methods.docu: Returns whether a cell is editable in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_iscelleditable.htm)

methods.name: isColumnSortedByRelatedData
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this BBjStandardGrid method returns an indication of whether specified column is sorted by relatedData rather than by cell text. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_iscolumnsortedbyrelateddata.htm)

methods.name: isColumnUserSortable
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this BBjStandardGrid method returns whether the grid to sort a specified column when the user clicks in the header of that column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_iscolumnusersortable.htm)

methods.name: resort
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this BBjStandardGrid method re-sorts the grid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_resort.htm)

methods.name: restoreCell
methods.docu: Restores a cell to its previous value in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_restorecell.htm)

methods.name: restoreRow
methods.docu: Restores all cell values in a row in the BBjStandardGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjstandardgrid/bbjstandardgrid_restorerow.htm)

methods.name: setAllColumnsUserSortable

classes.name: BBjWrappedJComponent
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, the BBjWrappedJComponent is a BBjControl. that contains (or 'wraps') a Java JComponent A BBjWrappedJComponent is both a ClientObject and a BBjControl. The methods of the wrapped JComponent can be invoked on the BBjWrappedJComponent and the methods of a BBjControl can also be invoked on the BBjWrappedJComponent [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwrappedjcomponent.htm)

classes.name: BBjDataBoundGrid
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, the BBjDataBoundGrid is a grid that can be bound to a BBjRecordSet. The selected row of the BBjDataBoundGrid is always the current record of its bound BBjRecordSet. Changes of the values in the BBjRecordSet are reflected in the BBjDataBoundGrid and edits that occur in the selected row of the BBjDataBoundGrid are reflected as changes in the current record of the BBjRecordSet. BBjDataBoundGrid extends the class BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataboundgrid/bbjdataboundgrid.htm)

methods.name: bindRecordSet
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method binds a BBjRecordSet to this BBjDataBoundGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataboundgrid/bbjdataboundgrid_bindrecordset.htm)

methods.name: setDefaultColumnHeaders
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the columnHeaderCellText for each column to the name of the field that is bound to the column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataboundgrid/bbjdataboundgrid_setdefaultcolumnheaders.htm)

classes.name: BBjInputN

classes.name: BBjGrid
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, the BBjGrid is the abstract base class for BBjStandardGrid, BBjDataAwareGrid and BBjDataBoundGrid. BBjGrid contains the methods that are common to BBjStandardGrid, BBjDataAwareGrid, and BBjDataBoundGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/BBjGrid.htm)

methods.name: addCellStyleName
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method adds a CSS style name to a grid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_addcellstylename.htm)

methods.name: addColumnStyleName
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method adds a CSS style name to a grid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_addcolumnstylename.htm)

methods.name: addRowStyleName
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method adds a CSS style name to a grid row. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_addrowstylename.htm)

methods.name: adjustSpacesWhenDisplaying
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method adjusts, for a given column, the spaces contained in data before displaying within a BBjGrid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_adjustspaceswhendisplaying.htm)

methods.name: adjustSpacesWhenSaving
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method adjusts, for a given BBjGrid column, the spaces the developer entered before returning it to the program. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_adjustspaceswhensaving.htm)

methods.name: clearCellStyleNames
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method clears CSS styles from a grid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_clearcellstylenames.htm)

methods.name: clearColumnStyleNames
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method clears CSS styles from a grid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_clearcolumnstylenames.htm)

methods.name: clearRowStyleNames
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method clears CSS styles from a grid row. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_clearrowstylenames.htm)

methods.name: deselectAllCells
methods.docu: Deselects all of the cells in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_deselectallcells.htm)

methods.name: doLowerCaseWhenDisplaying
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method adjusts, for a given BBjGrid column, the data to lowercase before displaying to the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_dolowercasewhendisplaying.htm)

methods.name: doLowerCaseWhenSaving
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method adjusts, for a given BBjGrid column, the data to lowercase before saving. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_dolowercasewhensaving.htm)

methods.name: doUpperCaseWhenDisplaying
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method adjusts, for a given BBjGrid column, the data to uppercase before displaying to the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_douppercasewhendisplaying.htm)

methods.name: doUpperCaseWhenSaving
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method adjusts, for a given BBjGrid column, the data to uppercase before saving. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_douppercasewhensaving.htm)

methods.name: fillGridWithColumns
methods.docu: In BBj 2.03 and higher, this method specifies whether to fit all columns into the displayed width of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_fillgridwithcolumns.htm)

methods.name: getBeepOnValidationFailure
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjGrid will beep when the application calls accept(0) in response to a validation event [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_getbeeponvalidationfailure.htm)

methods.name: getBottomRow
methods.docu: Returns the current visible bottom row in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getbottomrow.htm)

methods.name: getCell
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns the BBjGridCell data of the grid cell. The data returned is a snapshot of the current state of the grid only and does not get updated if anything changes within the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getCell.htm)

methods.name: getCellRange
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns a range of specified BBjGridCells in BBjGrid range of cells. The data returned is a snapshot of the current state of the grid only and does not get updated if anything changes within the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getCellRange.htm)

methods.name: getCellStyleNames
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method gets a list of all CSS style names that have been added to a grid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_getcellstylenames.htm)

methods.name: getCellText
methods.docu: Returns the value of the text stored in the specified cell.   For a BBjStandardGrid, this value is the empty string when the BBjStandardGrid is created and changes when the program calls setCellText(). For BBjDataBoundGrid and BBjDataAwareGrid this value is set when the grid is bound to a data source. For all grids this value is modified when the user edits the cell and then leaves the cell. If a validation routine is triggered by the editing of the cell, then the value returned by getCellText() does not change until the validation event is accepted. Note: If the type of the cell is InputN, InputE or InputD, then the value that is displayed to the user is obtained by applying the mask returned by getCellMask() to the text value that is obtained by getCellText(). This means that the text that is displayed to the user may be different from the value that is returned by getCellText() [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getcelltext.htm)

methods.name: getCellText
methods.docu: Returns the value of the text stored in the specified cell.   For a BBjStandardGrid, this value is the empty string when the BBjStandardGrid is created and changes when the program calls setCellText(). For BBjDataBoundGrid and BBjDataAwareGrid this value is set when the grid is bound to a data source. For all grids this value is modified when the user edits the cell and then leaves the cell. If a validation routine is triggered by the editing of the cell, then the value returned by getCellText() does not change until the validation event is accepted. Note: If the type of the cell is InputN, InputE or InputD, then the value that is displayed to the user is obtained by applying the mask returned by getCellMask() to the text value that is obtained by getCellText(). This means that the text that is displayed to the user may be different from the value that is returned by getCellText() [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getcelltext.htm)

methods.name: getCellVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns the vertical alignment of a BBjGrid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/BBjGrid_getCellVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: getClientAreaHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method returns the client area height.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getClientAreaHeight.htm)

methods.name: getClientAreaWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method returns the client area width.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getClientAreaWidth.htm)

methods.name: getColumnAlignment
methods.docu: Returns the default alignment for a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_getcolumnalignment.htm)

methods.name: getColumnBackColor
methods.docu: Returns the default background color of a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getcolumnbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: getColumnData
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns a range of specified BBjGridCells in a BBjGrid column. The data returned is a snapshot of the current state of the grid only and does not get updated if anything changes within the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getColumnData.htm)

methods.name: getColumnFont
methods.docu: Returns the default font of a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/fonts/bbjgrid_getcolumnfont.htm)

methods.name: getColumnForeColor
methods.docu: Returns the default foreground color of a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getcolumnforecolor.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderBackColor

methods.name: getColumnHeaderCellBackColor
methods.docu: Returns the background color of a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getcolumnheadercellbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderCellForeColor

methods.name: getColumnHeaderCellStyle
methods.docu: Returns the style of a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellstyle/bbjgrid_getcolumnheadercellstyle.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderCellText
methods.docu: Returns the text displayed in a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getcolumnheadercelltext.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderCellVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the vertical alignment for a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_getcolumnheadercellverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderFont
methods.docu: Returns the default font of the column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/fonts/bbjgrid_getcolumnheaderfont.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderForeColor
methods.docu: Returns the default foreground color of the column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getcolumnheaderforecolor.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, returns the height of the column header in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getcolumnheaderheight.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderStyle
methods.docu: Returns the style used by default for the column headers in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellstyle/bbjgrid_getcolumnheaderstyle.htm)

methods.name: getColumnHeaderVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this returns the default column header vertical alignment in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_getcolumnheaderverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: getColumnMask
methods.docu: Returns the default mask for a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getcolumnmask.htm)

methods.name: getColumnStyleNames
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method gets a list of all CSS styles names that have been added to a grid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_getcolumnstylenames.htm)

methods.name: getColumnVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the cell vertical alignment of all cells in a BBjGrid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/BBjGrid_getColumnVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: getColumnWidth
methods.docu: Retrieves the width of a specified column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getcolumnwidth.htm)

methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the column widths within a grid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getColumnWidths.htm)

methods.docu: Returns the default column width of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getdefaultcolumnwidth.htm)

methods.name: getDragAccept
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjGrid accepts drag and drop operations. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_getdragaccept.htm)

methods.name: getDragType
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method returns the drag type that was set in a previous call to setDragType () [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_getdragtype.htm)

methods.name: getDragType
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method returns the drag type that was set in a previous call to setDragType () [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_getdragtype.htm)

methods.name: getDropTypes
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method returns the drop types that were set in a previous call to setDropTypes (). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_getdroptypes.htm)

methods.name: getDropTypes
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method returns the drop types that were set in a previous call to setDropTypes (). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_getdroptypes.htm)

methods.name: getEditClickCount
methods.docu: Returns the number of mouse clicks needed to begin editing a cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_geteditclickcount.htm)

methods.name: getEditText
methods.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, this method returns the edit text associated with the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_getedittext.htm)

methods.name: getHasColumnHeader
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjGrid has a column header. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/headers/bbjgrid_gethascolumnheader.htm)

methods.name: getHorizontalCellSpacing
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, returns the amount of space between the columns in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_gethorizontalcellspacing.htm)

methods.name: getHorizontalLinesVisible
methods.docu: Returns whether horizontal lines between the rows are visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_gethorizontallinesvisible.htm)

methods.name: getHorizontalScrollable
methods.docu: Returns whether the horizontal scrollbar will appear if there are more columns than can be displayed in the space given in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_gethorizontalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: getHorizontalScrollBarAlways
methods.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, this method returns whether to show a horizontal scrollbar enabled using setHorizontalScrollable(), or to show the horizontal scrollbar only as needed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_gethorizontalscrollbaralways.htm)

methods.name: getInsertMode
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method returns a BBjGrid value that indicates whether the editor is in insert mode. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getinsertmode.htm)

methods.name: getInterspace
methods.docu:
In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method is deprecated; use getHorizontalCellSpacing().
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getinterspace.htm)

methods.name: getLeftColumn
methods.docu: Returns the current visible left-most column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getleftcolumn.htm)

methods.name: getLineColor
methods.docu: Returns the color of the separator lines in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getlinecolor.htm)

methods.name: getMainGridAlignment
methods.docu: Returns the alignment of the cells in the main part of the BBjGrid (not including the row or column headers). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_getmaingridalignment.htm)

methods.name: getMainGridBackColor
methods.docu: Returns the default background color of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getmaingridbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: getMainGridFont
methods.docu: Returns the default font of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/fonts/bbjgrid_getmaingridfont.htm)

methods.name: getMainGridForeColor
methods.docu: Returns the default foreground color of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getmaingridforecolor.htm)

methods.name: getMainGridStripeColor
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method returns the background stripe color of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getmaingridstripecolor.htm)

methods.name: getMainGridVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the vertical alignment of the cells in the main part of the BBjGrid (not including the row or column headers). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_getmaingridverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: getMaxVisibleColumns
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the maximum number of columns 
 that will fit inside the visible viewing area of the BBjGrid.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getMaxVisibleColumns.htm)

methods.name: getMaxVisibleRows
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the maximum number of rows 
 that will fit inside the visible viewing area of the BBjGrid.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getMaxVisibleRows.htm)

methods.name: getNumColumns
methods.docu: Returns the number of columns in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getnumcolumns.htm)

methods.name: getNumRows
methods.docu: Returns the number of rows in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getnumrows.htm)

methods.name: getPagingAmount
methods.docu: Returns the number of lines to scroll when scrolling by page in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_getpagingamount.htm)

methods.name: getRowData
methods.docu: In BBj 18.0 and higher, this method returns a range of specified BBjGridCells in a BBjGrid row or rows. The data returned is a snapshot of the current state of the grid only and does not get updated if anything changes within the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getRowData.htm)

methods.name: getRowData
methods.docu: In BBj 18.0 and higher, this method returns a range of specified BBjGridCells in a BBjGrid row or rows. The data returned is a snapshot of the current state of the grid only and does not get updated if anything changes within the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getRowData.htm)

methods.name: getRowGutter
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns the number of pixels separating 
 the row header and the main grid.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/headers/bbjgrid_getrowgutter.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeight
methods.docu: Returns the height of a row(s) in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getrowheight.htm)

methods.name: getRowHeight
methods.docu: Returns the height of a row(s) in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getrowheight.htm)

methods.name: getRowStyleNames
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method gets a list of all CSS styles names that have been added to a grid row. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_getrowstylenames.htm)

methods.name: getRowVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns the vertical alignment of all cells in a BBjGrid row. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/BBjGrid_getRowVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: getScrollbarTriggerTopBottomEvent
methods.docu: In BBj 20.10 and higher, this method returns value of the boolean flag indicating whether the BBjGridHitTopEvent and BBjGridHitBottomEvent events will trigger from the scrollbar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/BBjGrid_getScrollbarTriggerTopBottomEvent.htm)

methods.name: getScrollOutside
methods.docu: Returns whether the grid will scroll when the mouse cursor is moved outside the bounds of the BBjGrid during a drag and drop operation. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_getscrolloutside.htm)

methods.name: getScrollUpdate
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjGrid updates while being scrolled. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_getscrollupdate.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedCell
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the currently selected cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_getSelectedCell.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedCells
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the selected cells in a grid. If the grid is in multiple selection mode (BBjGrid::setMultipleSelection), then the BBjVector may contain multiple cells. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_getSelectedCells.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedColumns
methods.docu: In BBj 2.02 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the selected columns in a grid. If the grid is in multiple selection mode (BBjGrid::setMultipleSelection), then the BBjVector may contain multiple columns. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_getselectedcolumns.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedRow
methods.docu: Returns the currently selected row in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_getselectedrow.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedRows
methods.docu: In BBj 2.02 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing the selected rows in a grid. If the grid is in multiple selection mode (BBjGrid::setMultipleSelection), then the BBjVector may contain multiple rows. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_getselectedrows.htm)

methods.name: getSelectionBackground
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the current background BBjColor value for a selection in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/BBjGrid_getSelectionBackground.htm)

methods.name: getSelectionForeground
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the current foreground BBjColor value for a selection in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/BBjGrid_getSelectionForeground.htm)

methods.name: getSelectionMode
methods.docu: Returns the selection mode of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_getselectionmode.htm)

methods.name: getShouldHighlightSelectedColumn
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method returns whether the grid will highlight 
 the entire column of the currently selected cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getShouldHighlightSelectedColumn.htm)

methods.name: getShouldHighlightSelectedRow
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns whether the grid will highlight 
 the entire row of the currently selected cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getshouldhighlightselectedrow.htm)

methods.name: getShowMaskWhenRendering
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns an indication of whether 
 input style cells display the decoration characters of their mask in non-edit 
 mode.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getshowmaskwhenrendering.htm)

methods.name: getSnapToRowHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns an indication of whether the gird will adjust its height so that only full rows appear in the grid.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getsnaptorowheight.htm)

methods.name: getStartEditSelectionMode
methods.docu: In BBj 10.0 and higher, this method returns the selection mode that will be used when starting to edit a cell in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_getstarteditselectionmode.htm)

methods.name: getStringWidth
methods.docu: Returns the width of a string in pixels in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_getstringwidth.htm)

methods.name: getStripeCount
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method returns the number of BBjGrid rows to alternate between the stripe color and the default background color. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_getstripecount.htm)

methods.name: getTabAction
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method returns the current tab action in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_gettabaction.htm)

methods.name: getTabActionSkipsNonEditableCells
methods.docu: When the user presses Tab key while focus is on a grid cell, the focus will move based on the current TabAction of the grid (see getTabAction, setTabAction). If the program has called setTabActionSkipsNonEditableCells(TRUE), then the focus will skip any cells that are not editable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_gettabactionskipsnoneditablecells.htm)

methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method returns the tooltip text (also known as short cue in BBx) for the BBjGrid or for a specific grid column or cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_gettooltiptext.htm)

methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method returns the tooltip text (also known as short cue in BBx) for the BBjGrid or for a specific grid column or cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_gettooltiptext.htm)

methods.name: getTopRow
methods.docu: Returns the current top visible row in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_gettoprow.htm)

methods.name: getTrimBlankSpace
methods.docu: In BBj 9.0 and higher, this method returns an indication of this grid will trim its size if it is larger than the size needed to display the field table, all headers and all scrollbars.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_gettrimblankspace.htm)

methods.name: getVerticalCellSpacing
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, returns the amount of space between the rows in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getverticalcellspacing.htm)

methods.name: getVerticalLinesVisible
methods.docu: Returns whether the vertical lines between columns are visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getverticallinesvisible.htm)

methods.name: getVerticalScrollable
methods.docu: Returns whether the vertical scrollbar will appear if there are more rows than can be displayed in the space given in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_getverticalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: getVerticalScrollBarAlways
methods.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, this returns whether to always show a vertical scrollbar enabled using setVerticalScrollable, or to only show the vertical scrollbar as needed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_getverticalscrollbaralways.htm)

methods.name: getVisibleColumnCount
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the number of columns that are currently visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/deprecated/BBjGrid_getVisibleColumnCount.htm)

methods.name: getVisibleColumns
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this function returns the current number of visible columns in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getVisibleColumns.htm)

methods.name: getVisibleRowCount
methods.docu: Returns the number of rows that are currently visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_getvisiblerowcount.htm)

methods.name: getVisibleRows
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this function returns the current number of visible rows in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_getVisibleRows.htm)

methods.name: isColumnEditable
methods.docu: Returns whether a column is editable in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_iscolumneditable.htm)

methods.name: isColumnVisible
methods.docu: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified column is visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_iscolumnvisible.htm)

methods.name: isDataAware
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjGrid is data aware. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_isdataaware.htm)

methods.name: isDataBound
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, returns true if the BBjGrid is BBjDataBound. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_isdatabound.htm)

methods.name: isEditable
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjGrid is editable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_iseditable.htm)

methods.name: isEditing
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, returns whether the BBjGrid is currently in edit mode. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_isediting.htm)

methods.name: isEditOnKeyPress
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method determines if editing on keypress 
 is enabled for the specified cells.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/BBjGrid_isEditOnKeyPress.htm)

methods.name: isEnhancedSelectionModelEnabled
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method returns a boolean value that indicates 
 which selection model is currently being used in the grid; the Enhanced 
 or Legacy Selection Model.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_isEnhancedSelectionModelEnabled.htm)

methods.name: isEnterAsTab
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns whether pressing Enter while focus is on the grid will be interpreted as though the user had pressed Tab. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_isenterastab.htm)

methods.name: isFitToGrid
methods.docu: Returns whether to fit all columns into the displayed width of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_isfittogrid.htm)

methods.name: isPaging
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjGrid can be scrolled by paging. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_ispaging.htm)

methods.name: isRowVisible
methods.docu: Returns a boolean indicating whether the specified row is visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_isrowvisible.htm)

methods.name: isSelected
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method returns whether a specific grid cell is selected. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_isSelected.htm)

methods.name: isSelected
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method returns whether a specific grid cell is selected. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_isSelected.htm)

methods.name: isUserResizable
methods.docu: Returns whether the columns in the BBjGrid can be resized by the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_isuserresizable.htm)

methods.name: makeCell
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method creates a new BBjGridCell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_makeCell.htm)

methods.name: removeCellStyleName
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method removes a CSS style name from a grid cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_removecellstylename.htm)

methods.name: removeColumnStyleName
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method removes a CSS style name from a grid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_removecolumnstylename.htm)

methods.name: removeRowStyleName
methods.docu: In BBj 13.0 and higher, this method removes a CSS style name from a grid row. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cssstyle/bbjgrid_removerowstylename.htm)

methods.name: scrollToBottom
methods.docu: Scrolls down in order to set the bottom row visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_scrolltobottom.htm)

methods.name: setBeepOnValidationFailure
methods.docu: In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method sets whether a grid should beep when the application calls accept(0) during validation. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_setbeeponvalidationfailure.htm)

methods.name: setCell
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method sets the BBjGridCell data to the grid. The default data contained within the BBjGridCell will not get updated to the grid. Only the changed user specific data within the BBjGridCell will be updated to the grid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_setCell.htm)

methods.name: setCells
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method sets a BBjVector of BBjGridCells to the grid. The default data contained within the BBjGridCells will not get updated to the grid. Only the changed user-specific data within the BBjGridCells will be changed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_setCells.htm)

methods.name: setColumnAlignment
methods.docu: Sets the default alignment for a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setcolumnalignment.htm)

methods.name: setColumnBackColor
methods.docu: Sets the background color of a column of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setcolumnbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: setColumnEditable
methods.docu: Sets whether a column is editable in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_setcolumneditable.htm)

methods.name: setColumnFont
methods.docu: Sets the default font of a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/fonts/bbjgrid_setcolumnfont.htm)

methods.name: setColumnForeColor
methods.docu: Sets the foreground color for a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setcolumnforecolor.htm)

methods.name: setColumnGutter
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method sets the number of pixels separating the column header and the main BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/headers/bbjgrid_setcolumngutter.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderAlignment
methods.docu: Sets the default column header alignment for the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderalignment.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderBackColor
methods.docu: Sets the background color of the column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellAlignment
methods.docu: Sets the alignment for the column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercellalignment.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellBackColor
methods.docu: Sets the background color of a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercellbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellForeColor
methods.docu: Sets the foreground color of a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercellforecolor.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellIcon
methods.docu: Sets the icon in a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/iconfunctions/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercellicon.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellImage
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method sets the image displayed in a BBjGrid column header cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/iconfunctions/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercellimage.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellStyle
methods.docu: Sets the cell style used for a column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellstyle/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercellstyle.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderCellText
methods.docu: Sets the text to be displayed in a column header cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadercelltext.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderFont
methods.docu: Sets the font of the column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/fonts/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderfont.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderForeColor
methods.docu: Sets the default foreground color of the column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderforecolor.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, sets the height of the column header in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/headers/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderheight.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderStyle
methods.docu: Sets the style used for a column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellstyle/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderstyle.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderText
methods.docu: Sets the column header text in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_setcolumnheadertext.htm)

methods.name: setColumnHeaderVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this sets the default vertical alignment for the column header in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setcolumnheaderverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: setColumnMask
methods.docu: Sets the default mask for all cells in a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_setcolumnmask.htm)

methods.name: setColumnVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method sets the cell vertical alignment for all cells in a BBjGrid column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/BBjGrid_setColumnVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: setColumnVisible
methods.docu:
Scrolls the BBjGrid, if necessary, to ensure that the specified column 
 appears within the visible area.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setcolumnvisible.htm)

methods.name: setColumnWidth
methods.docu: Sets the width of a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setcolumnwidth.htm)

methods.name: setDefaultAlignment
methods.docu: Sets the default alignment for all of the cells in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setdefaultalignment.htm)

methods.name: setDefaultColumnWidth
methods.docu: Sets the default width of all columns in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setdefaultcolumnwidth.htm)

methods.name: setDefaultVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method sets the default vertical alignment for all cells in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/BBjGrid_setDefaultVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: setDragAccept
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjGrid will accept drag and drop operations. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_setdragaccept.htm)

methods.name: setDragType
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method sets an optional type string that an individual grid column or cell advertises to potential drop targets when the BBjGrid acts as a drag source. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_setdragtype.htm)

methods.name: setDragType
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method sets an optional type string that an individual grid column or cell advertises to potential drop targets when the BBjGrid acts as a drag source. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_setdragtype.htm)

methods.name: setDropTypes
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, these are the types that an individual grid column or cell is willing to accept from a drag source when the BBjGrid acts as a drop target. If no drop types are set, the grid will accept data of any type. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_setdroptypes.htm)

methods.name: setDropTypes
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, these are the types that an individual grid column or cell is willing to accept from a drag source when the BBjGrid acts as a drop target. If no drop types are set, the grid will accept data of any type. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/draganddrop/bbjgrid_setdroptypes.htm)

methods.name: setEditable
methods.docu: Sets whether the cells in the BBjGrid are editable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_seteditable.htm)

methods.name: setEditClickCount
methods.docu: Sets the number of mouse clicks needed to begin editing a cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/bbjgrid_seteditclickcount.htm)

methods.name: setEditOnKeyPress
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method sets a flag to enable or disable 
 the ability to edit cells directly on a keypress.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellediting/BBjGrid_setEditOnKeyPress.htm)

methods.name: setEnhancedSelectionModelEnabled
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method enables the Enhanced Selection Model 
 scheme for the current grid.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_setEnhancedSelectionModelEnabled.htm)

methods.name: setEnterAsTab
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method sets whether an ENTER key that is pressed while focus is on the grid will be interpreted as though a TAB key had been pressed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_setenterastab.htm)

methods.name: setFitToGrid
methods.docu: Specifies whether to fit all columns into the displayed width of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setfittogrid.htm)

methods.name: setHasColumnHeader
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjGrid has a column header. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/headers/bbjgrid_sethascolumnheader.htm)

methods.name: setHighlightMethod
methods.docu: Sets the highlight method for the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_sethighlightmethod.htm)

methods.name: setHorizontalCellSpacing
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, sets the amount of space between the columns in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_sethorizontalcellspacing.htm)

methods.name: setHorizontalLinesVisible
methods.docu: Sets whether the horizontal lines between the rows in the BBjGrid are visible. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_sethorizontallinesvisible.htm)

methods.name: setHorizontalScrollable
methods.docu: Sets whether the horizontal scrollbar will appear if there are more columns than can be displayed in the space given in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_sethorizontalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: setHorizontalScrollBarAlways
methods.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, this method sets whether to always show a horizontal scrollbar enabled using setHorizontalScrollable(), or to only show as needed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_sethorizontalscrollbaralways.htm)

methods.name: setInsertMode
methods.docu:
In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method controls whether the editor is in 
 insert mode.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellcontents/bbjgrid_setinsertmode.htm)

methods.name: setInterspace
methods.docu:
In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method is deprecated; use setHorizontalCellSpacing().
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setinterspace.htm)

methods.name: setLeftColumn
methods.docu: In BBj 8.00 and higher, this method sets a column in the BBjGrid to be the left-most visible column. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setleftcolumn.htm)

methods.name: setLineColor
