methods.docu: Sets the line color of the vertical and horizontal lines in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setlinecolor.htm)

methods.name: setMainGridAlignment
methods.docu: Sets the alignment for all of the cells in the main area of the BBjGrid (not including the row and column headers). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setmaingridalignment.htm)

methods.name: setMainGridBackColor
methods.docu: Sets the default background color of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setmaingridbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: setMainGridFont
methods.docu: Sets the default font used in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/fonts/bbjgrid_setmaingridfont.htm)

methods.name: setMainGridForeColor
methods.docu: Sets the default foreground color of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setmaingridforecolor.htm)

methods.name: setMainGridStripeColor
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method sets an optional background stripe color of BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setmaingridstripecolor.htm)

methods.name: setMainGridVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the vertical alignment for all of the cells in the main area of the BBjGrid (not including the row and column headers). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/bbjgrid_setmaingridverticalalignment.htm)

methods.name: setMouseCapture
methods.docu: Sets whether to capture mouse movement events in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setmousecapture.htm)

methods.name: setMultipleSelection
methods.docu: Sets whether multiple cells/rows/columns can be selected in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_setmultipleselection.htm)

methods.name: setPaging
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjGrid can be scrolled by paging. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_setpaging.htm)

methods.name: setPagingAmount
methods.docu: Sets number of lines to scroll when scrolling by page in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_setpagingamount.htm)

methods.name: setRowGutter
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method sets the number of pixels separating the row header and the main BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/headers/bbjgrid_setrowgutter.htm)

methods.name: setRowHeight
methods.docu: Sets the height of a row(s) in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setrowheight.htm)

methods.name: setRowHeight
methods.docu: Sets the height of a row(s) in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setrowheight.htm)

methods.name: setRowVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method sets the vertical alignment for all cells in a BBjGrid row. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellalignment/BBjGrid_setRowVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: setRowVisible
methods.docu: Scrolls the BBjGrid, if necessary, to ensure that the specified row appears within the visible area. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setrowvisible.htm)

methods.name: setScrollbarTriggerTopBottomEvent
methods.docu: In BBj 20.10 and higher, this method sets a flag to enable or disable the BBjGridHitTopEvent and BBjGridHitBottomEvent events while scrolling. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/BBjGrid_setScrollbarTriggerTopBottomEvent.htm)

methods.name: setScrollOutside
methods.docu: Sets whether the grid scrolls during a drag and drop operation when the mouse cursor is moved outside the bounds of the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_setscrolloutside.htm)

methods.name: setScrollUpdate
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjGrid updates the display of data in the cells while being scrolled. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_setscrollupdate.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedCell
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method selects a cell in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_setSelectedCell.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedCells
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method selects multiple cells in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/BBjGrid_setSelectedCells.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedColumn
methods.docu: Selects a column in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_setselectedcolumn.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedRow
methods.docu: Selects a row in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_setselectedrow.htm)

methods.name: setSelectionBackground
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method sets the background BBjColor value for a selection in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/BBjGrid_setSelectionBackground.htm)

methods.name: setSelectionForeground
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method sets the foreground BBjColor value of a selection in a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/BBjGrid_setSelectionForeground.htm)

methods.name: setSelectionMode
methods.docu: Sets the method to select cells in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_setselectionmode.htm)

methods.name: setShouldHighlightSelectedColumn
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method sets whether the grid will highlight 
 the entire column containing the currently selected cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/BBjGrid_setShouldHighlightSelectedColumn.htm)

methods.name: setShouldHighlightSelectedRow
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method sets whether the grid will highlight 
 the entire row containing the currently selected cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setshouldhighlightselectedrow.htm)

methods.name: setShowMaskWhenRendering
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.0 and higher, this method controls whether the input style 
 cells displays the decoration characters of their mask in non-edit mode.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/deprecated/bbjgrid_setshowmaskwhenrendering.htm)

methods.name: setSnapToRowHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method sets whether the grid will adjust its height so that it does not display any 'partial' rows.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setsnaptorowheight.htm)

methods.name: setStartEditSelectionMode
methods.docu: In BBj 10.0 and higher, this method sets the selection mode that will be used when a cell in a BBjGrid is edited. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_setstarteditselectionmode.htm)

methods.name: setStripeCount
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method sets the number of BBjGrid rows to alternate between the stripe color and the default background color [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/bbjgrid_setstripecount.htm)

methods.name: setTabAction
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method sets the current tab action in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_settabaction.htm)

methods.name: setTabActionSkipsNonEditableCells
methods.docu: When the user presses Tab key while focus is on a grid cell, the focus will move based on the current TabAction of the grid (see getTabAction, setTabAction). If the program has called setTabActionSkipsNonEditableCells(TRUE) then the focus will skip any cells that are not editable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/cellselection/bbjgrid_settabactionskipsnoneditablecells.htm)

methods.name: setToolTipText
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method sets the tooltip text (also known as short cue in BBx) for the BBjGrid or for a specific grid column or cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_settooltiptext.htm)

methods.name: setToolTipText
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method sets the tooltip text (also known as short cue in BBx) for the BBjGrid or for a specific grid column or cell. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_settooltiptext.htm)

methods.name: setTopRow
methods.docu: Sets a row to be the top visible row in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_settoprow.htm)

methods.name: setTrimBlankSpace
methods.docu: In BBj 9.0 and higher, when a grid is larger in size than the size required to display the table and all required headers and scrollbars, this method controls whether the grid will be trimmed to the minimum size to display the table, headers and scrollbars. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/bbjgrid_settrimblankspace.htm)

methods.name: setUserResizable
methods.docu: Sets whether the columns in the BBjGrid can be resized by the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setuserresizable.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalCellSpacing
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, sets the amount of space between the rows in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setverticalcellspacing.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalLinesVisible
methods.docu: Sets whether the vertical lines between the columns are to be visible in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/rowsandcolumns/bbjgrid_setverticallinesvisible.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalScrollable
methods.docu: Sets whether the vertical scrollbar will appear if there are more rows than can be displayed in the space given in the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_setverticalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalScrollBarAlways
methods.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, this method sets whether to always show a vertical scrollbar enabled using setVerticalScrollable, or to only show the vertical scrollbar as needed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_setverticalscrollbaralways.htm)

methods.name: setViewportColor
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method sets the viewport color for a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/colors/BBjGrid_setViewPortColor.htm)

methods.name: showCalendarForCell
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method programmatically calls the calendar 
 popup on an InputD cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/BBjGrid_showCalendarForCell.htm)

methods.name: showCalendarForCell
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method programmatically calls the calendar 
 popup on an InputD cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/BBjGrid_showCalendarForCell.htm)

methods.name: showCalendarForCell
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method programmatically calls the calendar 
 popup on an InputD cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/BBjGrid_showCalendarForCell.htm)

methods.name: showCalendarForCell
methods.docu:
In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method programmatically calls the calendar 
 popup on an InputD cell.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/miscfunctions/BBjGrid_showCalendarForCell.htm)

methods.name: suppressUpdatesWhileScrolling
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method suppresses update requests to the program while the user scrolls the BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgrid/scrolling/bbjgrid_suppressupdateswhilescrolling.htm)

classes.name: BBjSystemMetrics
classes.docu:
In BBj 5.0 and higher, the BBjSystemMetrics object provides information 
 about the client display.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics.htm)

methods.name: getSystemColor
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the system color for a specified part of the GUI. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getsystemcolor.htm)

methods.name: getSystemFontWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the current system font width in pixels. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getsystemfontwidth.htm)

methods.name: getSystemFontHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the current system font height in pixels. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getsystemfontheight.htm)

methods.name: getScreenCount
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the number of screen devices on the client. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getScreenCount.htm)

methods.name: getScreenNumber
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen number of the specified BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getScreenNumber.htm)

methods.name: getScreenSize
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen width and height in pixels. In BBj 15.0 and higher, the method taking an int parameter returns the selected screen width and height in pixels [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getscreensize.htm)

methods.name: getScreenSize
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen width and height in pixels. In BBj 15.0 and higher, the method taking an int parameter returns the selected screen width and height in pixels [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getscreensize.htm)

methods.name: getScreenInsets
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen insets in pixels. In BBj 15.0 and higher, the method taking an integer parameter returns the selected screen insets in pixels. The screen insets indicate how much of the overall screen dimensions to the top, bottom, left, and right the operating system reserved and are therefore unavailable for use. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getscreeninsets.htm)

methods.name: getScreenInsets
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen insets in pixels. In BBj 15.0 and higher, the method taking an integer parameter returns the selected screen insets in pixels. The screen insets indicate how much of the overall screen dimensions to the top, bottom, left, and right the operating system reserved and are therefore unavailable for use. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getscreeninsets.htm)

methods.name: getScreenBounds
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the default or selected screen bounds in pixels. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getScreenBounds.htm)

methods.name: getScreenBounds
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the default or selected screen bounds in pixels. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getScreenBounds.htm)

methods.name: getScreenResolution
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen resolution in dots per inch. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getscreenresolution.htm)

methods.name: getDisplayType
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns a constant that indicates the type of display in use on the client. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getdisplaytype.htm)

methods.name: getFontFamilies
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns all available font families. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/bbjsystemmetrics_getfontfamilies.htm)

methods.name: getDevicePixelRatio
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the ratio of physical to logical pixels on the client screen device. High-DPI ("retina") displays report values greater than 1 (typically 2). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getDevicePixelRatio.htm)

methods.name: getDevicePixelRatio
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the ratio of physical to logical pixels on the client screen device. High-DPI ("retina") displays report values greater than 1 (typically 2). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getDevicePixelRatio.htm)

methods.name: getScreenImage
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen as a BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getScreenImage.htm)

methods.name: getScreenImage
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjSystemMetrics method returns the screen as a BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjsystemmetrics/BBjSystemMetrics_getScreenImage.htm)

classes.name: BBjFont
classes.docu: BBjFont is an object that represents a font, which can be used to set or retrieve the font of a BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjfont/bbjfont.htm)

methods.name: getName
methods.docu: Returns the font family name.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjfont/bbjfont_getname.htm)

methods.name: getStyle
methods.docu: Returns the an integer representing the style of the font.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjfont/bbjfont_getstyle.htm)

methods.name: getSize
methods.docu: Returns the point size of the font.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjfont/bbjfont_getsize.htm)

classes.name: TabTraversable
classes.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, a BBjControl implements the TabTraversable interface if keyboard navigation can focus the control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TabTraversable/interface_tabtraversable.htm)

methods.name: setTabTraversable
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, setTabTraversable sets a value indicating whether or not the user can navigate to the control using the tab key. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TabTraversable/interface_tabtraversable_settabtraversable.htm)

classes.name: BBjImage
classes.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, use the BBjImage object to manipulate images on BBjButton, BBjToolButton, BBjTabCtrl, and BBjTopLevelWindow objects. Do not confuse the BBjImage object with the BBjImageCtrl control, which places an image on a window (BBjImageCtrl is now the object known prior to BBj 5.0 as BBjImage). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjimagemanager/bbjimage/bbjimage.htm)

methods.name: getImageSlice
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns a new BBjImage as a slice of another BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjimagemanager/bbjimage/bbjimage_getimageslice.htm)

methods.name: getBytes
methods.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method returns the raw image bytes from a BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjimagemanager/bbjimage/bbjimage_getbytes.htm)

methods.name: getWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the width in pixels of a BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjimagemanager/bbjimage/BBjImage_getWidth.htm)

methods.name: getHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method returns the height in pixels of a BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjimagemanager/bbjimage/BBjImage_getHeight.htm)

methods.name: isValid
methods.docu: This method returns a boolean indicating whether the BBjImage was successfully loaded. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjimagemanager/bbjimage/BBjImage_isValid.htm)

classes.name: BBjSplitter
classes.docu: The BBjSplitter control encapsulates two resizable controls separated by a divider that enables the user to dynamically resize them.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter.htm)

methods.name: getFirstControl
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the BBjControl above or to the left of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_getFirstControl.htm)

methods.name: getFirstControlID
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the id of the BBjControl above or to the left of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_getFirstControlID.htm)

methods.name: getOrientation
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the orientation of the BBjSplitter control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_getOrientation.htm)

methods.name: getPosition
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the position of the BBjSplitter horizontal or vertical divider.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_getPosition.htm)

methods.name: getSecondControl
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the BBjControl below or to the right of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_getSecondControl.htm)

methods.name: getSecondControlID
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the id of the BBjControl above or to the left of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_getSecondControlID.htm)

methods.name: setFirstControl
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the BBjControl to be shown above or to the left of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_setFirstControl.htm)

methods.name: setFirstControlID
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the id of the BBjControl to be shown above or to the left of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_setFirstControlID.htm)

methods.name: setOrientation
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the orientation of the BBjSplitter control to HORIZONTAL or VERTICAL.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_setOrientation.htm)

methods.name: setPosition
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the position of the BBjSplitter horizontal or vertical divider.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_setPosition.htm)

methods.name: setSecondControl
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the BBjControl to be shown below or to the right of the BBjSplitter divider. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_setSecondControl.htm)

methods.name: setSecondControlID
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the id of the BBjControl to be shown below or to the right of the BBjSplitter divider.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/BBjSplitter/BBjSplitter_setSecondControlID.htm)

classes.name: BBjMenuItem
classes.docu:
The BBjMenuItem object provides methods for manipulating a GUI menu 
 item control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem.htm)

methods.name: setAccelerator
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method sets the accelerator for a BBjMenuItem. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/bbjmenuitem_setaccelerator.htm)

methods.name: clearImageSize
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuItem method clears any previously set custom menu item image size, reverting to the inherent image size. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem_clearImageSize.htm)

methods.name: setImage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the image for a BBjMenuItem. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/bbjmenuitem_setimage.htm)

methods.name: setImageSize
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuItem method sets the size of the menu item image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem_setImageSize.htm)

methods.name: getImageWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuItem method returns the width in pixels of the menu item image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem_getImageWidth.htm)

methods.name: getImageHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuItem method returns the height in pixels of the menu item image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem_getImageHeight.htm)

methods.name: getParentMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the parent BBjMenu of this BBjMenuItem, or NULL() if the immediate parent of this BBjMenuItem is not a BBjMenu. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem_getParentMenu.htm)

methods.name: getParentPopupMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the parent BBjPopupMenu of this BBjMenuItem, or NULL() if the immediate parent of this BBjMenuItem is not a BBjPopupMenu. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenuitem/BBjMenuItem_getParentPopupMenu.htm)

classes.name: BBjListBox
classes.docu:
The BBjListBox object provides methods for manipulating a GUI listbox 
 control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox.htm)

methods.name: deselectAll
methods.docu: Removes any selections from the list in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_deselectall.htm)

methods.name: deselectIndex
methods.docu: Deselects an item from the list in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_deselectindex.htm)

methods.name: getAllItems
methods.docu: Retrieves all items from the list in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_getallitems.htm)

methods.name: getMultipleSelection
methods.docu: Returns whether multiple item selection is allowed in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_getmultipleselection.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedIndices
methods.docu: Retrieves all of the indices of the currently selected items in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_getselectedindices.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedItems
methods.docu: In BBj 23.04 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing all of the currently selected items in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_getSelectedItems.htm)

methods.name: setImageAt
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method sets an image to display beside the text on a specified BBjListBox index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_setImageAt.htm)

methods.name: setMultipleSelection
methods.docu: Sets whether multiple item selection is allowed in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_setmultipleselection.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedIndices
methods.docu: Sets multiple item in the BBjListBox control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/bbjlistbox_setselectedindices.htm)

methods.name: setTextAt
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method updates the text on an existing BBjListBox index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_setTextAt.htm)

methods.name: setBackColorAt
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method sets the background color of a specified BBjListBox index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_setBackColorAt.htm)

methods.name: getBackColorAt
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method returns the background color of a specified BBjListBox index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_getBackColorAt.htm)

methods.name: setForeColorAt
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method sets the foreground color of a specified BBjListBox index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_setForeColorAt.htm)

methods.name: getForeColorAt
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method returns the foreground color of a specified BBjListBox index. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbox/BBjListBox_getForeColorAt.htm)

classes.name: BBjMenuButton
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, the BBjMenuButton object provides methods for manipulating a rollover-style button control with an optional dropdown menu. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton.htm)

methods.name: setImageFile
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method sets the icon to be displayed in a menu button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_setimagefile.htm)

methods.name: getImageFile
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method returns the name of the image file used for the icon in a menu button control [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_getimagefile.htm)

methods.name: setImage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method sets the image to display in the menu button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_setimage.htm)

methods.name: clearImageSize
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method clears any previously set custom button image size, reverting to the inherent image size. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_clearImageSize.htm)

methods.name: setImageSize
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method sets the size of the button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_setImageSize.htm)

methods.name: getImageWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method returns the width in pixels of the button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_getImageWidth.htm)

methods.name: getImageHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method returns the height in pixels of the button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_getImageHeight.htm)

methods.name: addDropdownMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method creates a BBjPopupMenu control and sets it as the dropdown menu for a menu button control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_adddropdownmenu.htm)

methods.name: setDropdownMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method assigns an existing popup menu as the dropdown menu of a menu button control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_setdropdownmenu.htm)

methods.name: getDropdownMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method retrieves the dropdown menu from a menu button control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_getdropdownmenu.htm)

methods.name: removeDropdownMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method removes the dropdown menu from a menu button control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_removedropdownmenu.htm)

methods.name: setDropdownMenuVisible
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method programmatically hides or shows the dropdown menu. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_setDropdownMenuVisible.htm)

methods.name: isDropdownMenuVisible
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method indicates whether a BBjMenuButton dropdown menu is currently visible (open). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_isDropdownMenuVisible.htm)

methods.name: setBorderPainted
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets whether a BBjMenuButton should always show a border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_setborderpainted.htm)

methods.name: isBorderPainted
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method indicates whether a BBjMenuButton will always paint a border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/bbjmenubutton_isborderpainted.htm)

methods.name: setDropdownButtonWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method sets the width of the dropdown button on the right edge of the menu button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_setDropdownButtonWidth.htm)

methods.name: getDropdownButtonWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjMenuButton method returns the width of the dropdown button on the right edge of the menu button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_getDropdownButtonWidth.htm)

methods.name: setBeep
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method sets a boolean value indicating whether to beep on the client when the user clicks this BBjMenuButton. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_setBeep.htm)

methods.name: getBeep
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean value indicating whether to beep on the client when the user clicks this BBjMenuButton. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_getBeep.htm)

methods.name: setDisableOnClick
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets a boolean value indicating whether this BBjMenuButton should be immediately disabled when the user clicks it. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_setDisableOnClick.htm)

methods.name: getDisableOnClick
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean value indicating whether the BBjMenuButton will be immediately disabled when the user clicks it. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubutton/BBjMenuButton_getDisableOnClick.htm)

classes.name: BBjFileChooser
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, the BBjFileChooser object provides methods for manipulating a GUI file chooser control, similar to the FILEOPEN Mnemonic or FILEOPEN() Function. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser.htm)

methods.name: changeToParentDirectory
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, invoke this method to programmatically show the parent directory of the current directory shown in the file chooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_changetoparentdirectory.htm)

methods.name: ensureFileNameIsVisible
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, invoke this method to ensure a specific file name is visible in the BBjFileChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_ensurefilenameisvisible.htm)

methods.name: rescanCurrentDirectory
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, invoke this BBjFileChooser method to programmatically refresh the display of the current directory. Use this after modifying the on-disk contents of a directory currently being displayed to the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_rescancurrentdirectory.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedFile
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjFileChooser method is a shortcut for getSelectedFiles().get(0). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_getselectedfile.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedFile
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, use this method to set a single file as the currently selected file in the BBjFileChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_setselectedfile.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedFiles
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns a list of the currently selected files in the BBjFileChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_getselectedfiles.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedFiles
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method selects a list of files in the BBjFileChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_setselectedfiles.htm)

methods.name: getCurrentDirectory
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the absolute path of the BBjFileChooser's current directory. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_getcurrentdirectory.htm)

methods.name: setCurrentDirectory
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, use this method to display a specific directory's contents in the BBjFileChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_setcurrentdirectory.htm)

methods.name: getFileSelectionMode
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjFileChooser method returns whether the user may select files only, files and directories, or directories only. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_getfileselectionmode.htm)

methods.name: setFileSelectionMode
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, use this method to set whether the BBjFileChooser allows selecting files only, files and directories, or directories only. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfilechooser/bbjfilechooser_setfileselectionmode.htm)

methods.name: isAcceptAllFileFilterUsed

methods.name: isMultiSelectionEnabled

methods.name: setMultiSelectionEnabled

methods.name: addFileFilter

methods.name: addFileFilter

methods.name: setDropZoneVisible

methods.name: getDropZoneVisible

If no drop types are set, the control will accept data of any type. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_DropTarget/interface_droptarget_setdroptypes.htm)

classes.name: BBjScrollBar
classes.docu:
The BBjScrollBar object provides methods for manipulating a GUI scroll bar control.
Note: The BBjScrollBar is a standalone BBjControl that should not be confused with scroll bars that can be created with optional flags on windows, child windows, or edit-type controls. To enable scrolling behavior in a window, horizontal or vertical scrollbars must be enabled and tracking must be turned off. Use the window creation flags $00000004$ (horizontal scrolling) or $00000008$ (vertical scrolling), and set tracking to 0 with window creation flag $80000000$, BBjWindow::setTrack, or the TRACK Mnemonic - Toggle Tracking On/Off (SYSGUI).
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/BBjScrollbar.htm)

methods.name: setScrollPosition
methods.docu: Sets the thumb position for the BBjScrollBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/bbjscrollbar_setscrollposition.htm)

methods.name: getScrollPosition
methods.docu: Returns the thumb position of the BBjScrollBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/bbjscrollbar_getscrollposition.htm)

methods.name: setScrollRange
methods.docu: Sets the scroll range for the BBjScrollBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/bbjscrollbar_setscrollrange.htm)

methods.name: getScrollMinimum
methods.docu: Returns the minimum range of the BBjScrollBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/bbjscrollbar_getscrollminimum.htm)

methods.name: getScrollMaximum
methods.docu: Returns the maximum range of the BBjScrollBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/bbjscrollbar_getscrollmaximum.htm)

methods.name: setScrollProp

methods.name: getScrollProp
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the BBjScrollBar thumb, relative to the overall width of the control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/bbjscrollbar_getscrollprop.htm)

methods.name: setBlockIncrement
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the number of units to adjust the BBjScrollBar control when clicking in the body (as opposed to dragging the thumb). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/BBjScrollBar_setBlockIncrement.htm)

methods.name: getBlockIncrement
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the number of units to adjust the BBjScrollBar control when clicking in the body (as opposed to dragging the thumb). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjscrollbar/BBjScrollBar_getBlockIncrement.htm)

methods.name: addHorizontalScrollBar
methods.docu:
Creates a horizontal scroll bar control in the BBjWindow.
Note: The BBjScrollBar is a standalone BBjControl that should not be confused with scroll bars that can be created with optional flags on windows, child windows, or edit-type controls. To enable scrolling behavior in a window, horizontal or vertical scrollbars must be enabled and tracking must be turned off. Use the window creation flags $00000004$ (horizontal scrolling) or $00000008$ (vertical scrolling), and set tracking to 0 with window creation flag $80000000$, BBjWindow::setTrack, or the TRACK Mnemonic - Toggle Tracking On/Off (SYSGUI).
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_addhorizontalscrollbar.htm)

methods.name: addVerticalScrollBar
methods.docu:
Adds a vertical scroll bar control in the BBjWindow.
Note: The BBjScrollBar is a standalone BBjControl that should not be confused with scroll bars that can be created with optional flags on windows, child windows, or edit-type controls. To enable scrolling behavior in a window, horizontal or vertical scrollbars must be enabled and tracking must be turned off. Use the window creation flags $00000004$ (horizontal scrolling) or $00000008$ (vertical scrolling), and set tracking to 0 with window creation flag $80000000$, BBjWindow::setTrack, or the TRACK Mnemonic - Toggle Tracking On/Off (SYSGUI).
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_addverticalscrollbar.htm)

methods.docu: In BBj 22.00 and higher, this method returns a boolean indicating whether this window is implemented on the client in a simplified structure that doesn't support status bars or internal docked child windows.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_isSimpleWindow.htm)

methods.name: raise
methods.docu: In BBj 9.00 and higher, this method this method brings the window to the front (see RAISE Mnemonic). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_raise.htm)

methods.name: removePanelStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 21.00 and higher, removes a CSS class name from the content panel of a BBjWindow.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_removePanelStyle.htm)

methods.name: restoreControl
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method restores a BBjControl object to the BBjWindow from a BBjTabCtrl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_restoreControl.htm)

methods.name: setCursor
methods.docu: In BBj 3.01 and higher, this method sets the cursor style on the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_setcursor.htm)

methods.name: setDockStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 21.00 and higher, this method sets a CSS property on the dock panel of a BBjWindow.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setDockStyle.htm)

methods.name: setEnterAsTab
methods.docu:
In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method sets whether the ENTER key navigates 
 between controls like the TAB key.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_setenterastab.htm)

methods.name: setEventMask
methods.docu: In BBj 23.02 and higher, this BBjWindow method changes the set of events that are reported by a given window. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setEventMask.htm)

methods.name: setHorizontalScrollPosition
methods.docu: In BBj 14.00 and higher, this method scrolls the window horizontally to the specified position.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setHorizontalScrollPosition.htm)

methods.name: setIcon
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method assigns an icon to the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_seticon.htm)

methods.name: setIcon
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method assigns an icon to the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_seticon.htm)

methods.name: setIcon
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method assigns an icon to the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_seticon.htm)

methods.name: setIcons
methods.docu: In BBj 16.00 and higher, this method assigns multiple icons to a BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setIcons.htm)

methods.name: setPanelStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 21.00 and higher, this method sets a CSS property on the content panel of a BBjWindow.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setPanelStyle.htm)

methods.name: setRepaintEnabled
methods.docu:
In BBj 16.00 and higher, this BBjWindow 
 method controls whether program action (such as adding controls or setting 
 attributes of controls) will cause a repaint on the window.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setRepaintEnabled.htm)

methods.name: setReportAllKeyEvents
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method sets an option to have all controls 
 report keypress events to the window.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setReportAllKeyEvents.htm)

methods.name: setReportAllMouseEvents
methods.docu:
In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method sets an option to have all controls 
 report low-level mouse events (mouse down, mouse up, etc.) to the window.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setReportAllMouseEvents.htm)

methods.name: setScribble
methods.docu:
In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method toggles scribble mode on the window 
 (see SCRIBBLE Mnemonic).[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_setscribble.htm)

methods.name: setTrack
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method toggles the tracking mode of the window (see TRACK Mnemonic). By default, tracking is enabled. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/bbjwindow_settrack.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalScrollPosition
methods.docu:
In BBj 14.00 and higher, this method scrolls the window vertically to 
 the specified position.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjwindow/BBjWindow_setVerticalScrollPosition.htm)

classes.name: BBjChildWindow
classes.docu: The BBjChildWindow is a child window that must be created within a BBjWindow. The window that the child window is created in will be the child's parent window. BBjChildWindow extends from BBjWindow and implements methods within BBjWindow and BBjControl. See Child Windows for an introduction to child windows. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchildwindow/bbjchildwindow.htm)

methods.name: getParentWindow
methods.docu: Returns the child window's parent as either a BBjChildWindow or BBjTopLevelWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchildwindow/bbjchildwindow_getparentwindow.htm)

methods.name: getDockLocation
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the child window's docked location. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchildwindow/bbjchildwindow_getdocklocation.htm)

methods.name: setDockLocation
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method sets the child window's docked location. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchildwindow/bbjchildwindow_setdocklocation.htm)

methods.name: setBorderColor
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method sets the border color of the BBjChildWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchildwindow/BBjChildWindow_setBorderColor.htm)

methods.name: getBorderColor
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the border color of the BBjChildWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchildwindow/BBjChildWindow_getBorderColor.htm)

classes.name: BBjProgressBar
classes.docu:
In BBj 3.0 and higher, the BBjProgressBar object provides methods for 
 manipulating a GUI progress bar control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar.htm)

methods.name: setMinimum
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method sets the minimum range for the BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_setminimum.htm)

methods.name: getMinimum
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns the minimum range of the BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_getminimum.htm)

methods.name: setMaximum
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method sets the maximum range for the BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_setmaximum.htm)

methods.name: getMaximum
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns the maximum range of the BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_getmaximum.htm)

methods.name: setOrientation
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method sets the orientation of the BBjProgressBar control to HORIZONTAL or VERTICAL. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_setorientation.htm)

methods.name: getOrientation
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns the orientation of the BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_getorientation.htm)

methods.name: setValue
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method sets the value of a BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_setvalue.htm)

methods.name: getValue
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns the current value of a BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_getvalue.htm)

methods.name: setStringPainted
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method determines whether the BBjProgressBar control will show a label. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_setstringpainted.htm)

methods.name: isStringPainted
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjProgressBar will display a label (defaults to % complete). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_isstringpainted.htm)

methods.name: setText
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method sets the text (label) of a BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_settext.htm)

methods.name: getText
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns the text of a BBjProgressBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_gettext.htm)

methods.name: setIndeterminate
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method sets whether the BBjProgressBar is indeterminate. This option is not available on all platforms. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_setindeterminate.htm)

methods.name: isIndeterminate
methods.docu: In BBj 3.0 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjProgressBar is determinate. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprogressbar/bbjprogressbar_isindeterminate.htm)

classes.name: BBjCheckableMenuItem
classes.docu:
The BBjCheckableMenuItem object provides methods for manipulating a 
 checkable menu item control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcheckablemenuitem/bbjcheckablemenuitem.htm)

methods.name: setSelected
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjCheckableMenuItem check is selected. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcheckablemenuitem/bbjcheckablemenuitem_setselected.htm)

methods.name: isSelected
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjCheckableMenuItem check is selected. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcheckablemenuitem/bbjcheckablemenuitem_isselected.htm)

classes.name: BBjRadioButton
classes.docu:
The BBjRadioButton object provides methods 
 for manipulating a GUI radio button control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjradiobutton/BBjRadioButton.htm)

methods.name: getRadioGroup
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjRadioGroup with which this BBjRadioButton associated. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjradiobutton/bbjradiobutton_getradiogroup.htm)

classes.name: BBjMenuBar
classes.docu:
The BBjMenuBar object provides methods for manipulating a GUI menu bar 
 control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/BBjMenuBar.htm)

methods.name: addMenu
methods.docu: Adds a menu to the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_addmenu.htm)

methods.name: insertMenu
methods.docu: Inserts menu into the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_insertmenu.htm)

methods.name: getMenuAt
methods.docu: Returns a BBjMenu object from the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_getmenuat.htm)

methods.name: getMenuIDAt
methods.docu: Returns the ID of a menu from the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_getmenuidat.htm)

methods.name: getMenu
methods.docu: Returns a BBjMenu object from the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_getmenu.htm)

methods.name: removeMenuAt
methods.docu: Removes a menu from the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_removemenuat.htm)

methods.name: removeMenu
methods.docu: Removes a menu from the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_removemenu.htm)

methods.name: removeMenu
methods.docu: Removes a menu from the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_removemenu.htm)

methods.name: getMenuString
methods.docu: Returns a string representation of the BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_getmenustring.htm)

methods.name: getChildCount
methods.docu: In BBj 8.0 and higher, this method returns the number of items in a BBjMenuBar. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjmenubar/bbjmenubar_getchildcount.htm)

classes.name: BBjInputT
classes.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, the BBjInputT object provides methods for manipulating a GUI time control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputT/BBjInputT.htm)

methods.name: getValue
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the time value of a BBjInputT control in the same format as the BBx TIM variable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputT/BBjInputT_getValue.htm)

methods.name: setValue
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method sets the time value of the BBjInputT control in the same format as the BBx TIM variable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputT/BBjInputT_setValue.htm)

methods.name: showTimePicker
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method pops up a time picker dialog attached to the BBjInputT control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputT/BBjInputT_showTimePicker.htm)

classes.name: BBjGeolocation
classes.docu:
In BBj 11.0 and higher, the BBjGeolocation object provides an interface 
 to the browser's geolocation subsystem.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation.htm)

methods.name: isHighAccuracy
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the highAccuracy option that will be used in subsequent requests for geolocation information.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_ishighaccuracy.htm)

methods.name: setHighAccuracy
methods.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method sets the highAccuracy option for use in subsequent requests for geolocation information.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_sethighaccuracy.htm)

methods.name: getTimeout
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the timeout option that will be used in subsequent requests for geolocation information.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_gettimeout.htm)

methods.name: setTimeout
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method sets the timeout option for use in subsequent requests for geolocation information.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_settimeout.htm)

methods.name: getMaximumAge
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the maximumAge value that will be used in subsequent requests for geolocation information.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_getmaximumage.htm)

methods.name: setMaximumAge
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method sets the maximumAge option for use in subsequent requests for geolocation information.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_setmaximumage.htm)

methods.name: getCurrentPosition
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method requests that the browser pass back geolocation information in a subsequent BBjGeolocationEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjgeolocation/bbjgeolocation_getcurrentposition.htm)

classes.name: BBjInputDSpinner
classes.docu: The BBjInputDSpinner object provides a spinner on a BBjInputD. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner.htm)

methods.name: getNextDate
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method returns the date that the spinner would return, as a Julian date, if pressing the spin up button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_getnextdate.htm)

methods.name: getPreviousDate
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method returns the date that the spinner would return, as a Julian date, if pressing the spin down button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_getpreviousdate.htm)

methods.name: getMaximumDate
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method returns the maximum date of the spinner as a Julian date. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_getmaximumdate.htm)

methods.name: setMaximumDate
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method changes the maximum date to which the spinner will spin, specified as a Julian date. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_setmaximumdate.htm)

methods.name: getMinimumDate
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method returns the minimum date of the spinner as a Julian date. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_getminimumdate.htm)

methods.name: setMinimumDate
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method changes the minimum date to which the spinner will spin, specified as a Julian date. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_setminimumdate.htm)

methods.name: getSpinField
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method returns the field signifying how much the spinner will spin on an up or down button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_getspinfield.htm)

methods.name: setSpinField
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjInputDSpinner method specifies whether the spinner will spin by days, weeks, months, or years. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputdspinner/bbjinputdspinner_setspinfield.htm)

classes.name: BBjListButton
classes.docu:
The BBjListButton object provides methods for manipulating a GUI list 
 button control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistbutton/bbjlistbutton.htm)

classes.name: BBjGridHeader
classes.docu: The BBjGridHeader is an object representation of a header of a BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgridheader/bbjgridheader.htm)

methods.name: getDefaultAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, returns the default alignment of this BBjGridHeader. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgridheader/bbjgridheader_getdefaultalignment.htm)

methods.name: getDefaultStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, returns the default style of this BBjGridHeader. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgridheader/bbjgridheader_getdefaultstyle.htm)

methods.name: setDefaultAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, sets the default alignment of this BBjGridHeader. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgridheader/bbjgridheader_setdefaultalignment.htm)

methods.name: setDefaultStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, sets the default style of this BBjGridHeader. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjgridheader/bbjgridheader_setdefaultstyle.htm)

classes.name: BBjFontChooser
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, the BBjFontChooser object provides methods for manipulating a GUI font chooser control and an interface to allow users to select fonts, for example, in a preferences dialog. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser.htm)

methods.name: getSelectedFont
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the current font selection in the BBjFontChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_getselectedfont.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedFont
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the currently selected font in the BBjFontChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_setselectedfont.htm)

methods.name: getFontsScaled
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method determines if the BBjFontChooser should scale its fonts to match BBj behavior or use unscaled fonts to match Java behavior. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_getfontsscaled.htm)

methods.name: setFontsScaled
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets whether the BBjFontChooser should scale its fonts to match BBj behavior or use unscaled fonts to match Java behavior. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_setfontsscaled.htm)

methods.name: getPreviewMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjFontChooser's preview message. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_getpreviewmessage.htm)

methods.name: setPreviewMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the BBjFontChooser's preview message. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_setpreviewmessage.htm)

methods.name: getCancelButtonText
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns the BBjFontChooser's cancel button text, which is initially set based on the STBL("!LOCALE") language when the BBjFontChooser is created. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_getcancelbuttontext.htm)

methods.name: setCancelButtonText
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the text of the BBjFontChooser's [Cancel] button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/bbjfontchooser_setcancelbuttontext.htm)

methods.name: getFontFamilies
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the list of available font families in the BBjFontChooser as a BBjVector of strings. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/BBjFontChooser_getFontFamilies.htm)

methods.name: setFontFamilies
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the list of available font family names in the BBjFontChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/BBjFontChooser_setFontFamilies.htm)

methods.name: getFontSizes
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the list of available font sizes in the BBjFontChooser as a BBjVector of integers. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/BBjFontChooser_getFontSizes.htm)

methods.name: setFontSizes
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the list of available font sizes in the BBjFontChooser. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjfontchooser/BBjFontChooser_setFontSizes.htm)

classes.name: BBjCheckBox
classes.docu: The BBjCheckBox object provides methods for manipulating a GUI check box control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcheckbox/BBjCheckBox.htm)

classes.name: BBjTopLevelWindow
classes.docu: A BBjTopLevelWindow is an object that represents a TopLevelWindow control. A TopLevelWindow is the outermost form of window and can be displayed on screen by itself (without a parent). This window can contain child windows and controls. The BBjTopLevelWindow extends from BBjWindow and implements all methods from BBjWindow and BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow.htm)

methods.name: isTitleBarVisible
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns true if the BBjTopLevelWindow's title bar and frame are visible. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_istitlebarvisible.htm)

methods.name: setTitleBarVisible
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets whether the title bar and frame on a BBjTopLevelWindow is visible. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_settitlebarvisible.htm)

methods.name: minimize
methods.docu: Minimizes the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_minimize.htm)

methods.name: maximize
methods.docu: Maximizes the BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_maximize.htm)

methods.name: restore
methods.docu: Restores the BBjWindow to its location and size before the last minimize or maximize. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_restore.htm)

methods.name: isMaximized
methods.docu: In BBj 10.0 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjWindow is maximized. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_ismaximized.htm)

methods.name: isMinimized
methods.docu: In BBj 10.0 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjWindow is minimized. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_isminimized.htm)

methods.name: getOuterX
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the outer screen X of a BBjTopLevelWindow, including the title bar and borders. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/BBjTopLevelWindow_getOuterX.htm)

methods.name: getOuterY
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the outer screen Y of a BBjTopLevelWindow, including the title bar and borders. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/BBjTopLevelWindow_getOuterY.htm)

methods.name: getOuterWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the outer width of a BBjTopLevelWindow, including the title bar and borders. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/BBjTopLevelWindow_getOuterWidth.htm)

methods.name: getOuterHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the outer height of a BBjTopLevelWindow, including the title bar and borders. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/BBjTopLevelWindow_getOuterHeight.htm)

methods.name: setTitle
methods.docu: Sets the title a top level BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/bbjtoplevelwindow_settitle.htm)

methods.name: getValues
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, the this method returns a BBjWindowValues object which contains the values of all simple controls on this BBjTopLevelWindow. Because this value is returned in a single operation, network overhead across distributed client/server connections is minimized. Complex controls containing multiple values (like grids) are not included in this data structure. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/BBjTopLevelWindow_getValues.htm)

methods.name: getWindowMode
methods.docu: In BBj 21.0 and higher, this method returns the runtime mode of a BBjTopLevelWindow. The available modes (MDI, SDI, DETACHED) are defined in BBjMDI::getDefaultMDIMode. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtoplevelwindow/BBjTopLevelWindow_getWindowMode.htm)

classes.name: BBjListSpinner
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, the BBjListSpinner is an abstract class of the BBjInputESpinner and the BBjEditBoxSpinner spinner controls that spin over a list. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistspinner/bbjlistspinner.htm)

methods.name: getSpinList
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjListSpinner method returns the list previously set on the BBjListSpinner. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistspinner/bbjlistspinner_getspinlist.htm)

methods.name: setSpinList
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjListSpinner method sets the list of values displayed by the BBjListSpinner. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistspinner/bbjlistspinner_setspinlist.htm)

methods.name: getListIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjListSpinner method returns the index in the spin list of the displayed value. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistspinner/bbjlistspinner_getlistindex.htm)

methods.name: setListIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjListSpinner method sets the currently displayed value to the one at the specified index in the list. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlistspinner/bbjlistspinner_setlistindex.htm)

classes.name: Editable

methods.name: isEditable
methods.docu: Returns a value indicating whether or not the user can edit the control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Editable/interface_editable_iseditable.htm)

classes.name: ClientValidation
