classes.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, a BBjControl implements the ClientValidation interface if it supports a client-side JavaScript validation function. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation.htm)

methods.name: getClientValidationFunction
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, getClientValidationFunction returns the JavaScript client validation function that was specified with setClientValidationFunction. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation_getClientValidationFunction.htm)

methods.name: getClientValidationMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, getClientValidationMessage returns the error message to be displayed next to this control when the client validation function returns boolean false (invalid).[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation_getClientValidationMessage.htm)

methods.name: isClientValidationValid
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, isClientValidationValid returns a boolean value that indicates whether the client validation function, if any, currently reports that this control contains a valid value.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation_isClientValidationValid.htm)

methods.name: isClientValidationValid
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, isClientValidationValid returns a boolean value that indicates whether the client validation function, if any, currently reports that this control contains a valid value.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation_isClientValidationValid.htm)

methods.name: setClientValidationFunction
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method is used to specify a client-side JavaScript function that will validate the contents of this control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation_setClientValidationFunction.htm)

methods.name: setClientValidationMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method is used to specify the message that will be displayed to the user when the control fails client validation.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_ClientValidation/Interface_ClientValidation_setClientValidationMessage.htm)

classes.name: BBjCommonChart
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, BBjCommonChart is an abstract class that acts as the base class for BBjBarChart, BBjLineChart, and BBjPieChart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcommonchart/bbjcommonchart.htm)

methods.name: clearData
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method clears all data from a BBjChart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcommonchart/bbjcommonchart_cleardata.htm)

classes.name: BBjInputNSpinner
classes.docu: The BBjInputNSpinner object provides a spinner control on a standard BBjInputN. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner.htm)

methods.name: getMaximum
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method returns the maximum value of the spinner. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_getmaximum.htm)

methods.name: setMaximum
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method changes the maximum number to which the spinner will spin. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_setmaximum.htm)

methods.name: getMinimum
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method returns the minimum value of the spinner. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_getminimum.htm)

methods.name: setMinimum
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method changes the minimum number to which the spinner will spin. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_setminimum.htm)

methods.name: getStepSize
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method returns the amount by which the spinner will change upon a spin action. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_getstepsize.htm)

methods.name: setStepSize
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method changes the amount by which the spinner will change upon a spin action. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_setstepsize.htm)

methods.name: getNextNumber
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method returns the next value to which the spinner would spin up. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_getnextnumber.htm)

methods.name: getPreviousNumber
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjInputNSpinner method returns the value to which the spinner would spin down. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjinputnspinner/bbjinputnspinner_getpreviousnumber.htm)

classes.name: BBjButton
classes.docu: The BBjButton object provides methods for manipulating a GUI button control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton.htm)

methods.name: clearImage
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjButton method clears any previously set button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_clearImage.htm)

methods.name: clearImageSize
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjButton method clears any previously set custom button image size, reverting to the inherent image size. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_clearImageSize.htm)

methods.name: getBeep
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean value indicating whether to beep on the client when the user clicks this BBjButton. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_getBeep.htm)

methods.name: getDisableOnClick
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean value indicating whether the BBjButton will be immediately disabled when the user clicks it. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_getDisableOnClick.htm)

methods.name: getImageFile
methods.docu: Returns the name of the image file used for the icon in the BBjButton. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/bbjbutton_getimagefile.htm)

methods.name: getImageHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjButton method returns the height in pixels of the button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_getImageHeight.htm)

methods.name: getImageWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjButton method returns the width in pixels of the button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_getImageWidth.htm)

methods.name: getVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method returns an integer value indicating the BBjButton's vertical text alignment. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_getVerticalAlignment.htm)

methods.name: setBeep
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method sets a boolean value indicating whether to beep on the client when the user clicks this BBjButton. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_setBeep.htm)

methods.name: setDisableOnClick
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets a boolean value indicating whether this BBjButton should be immediately disabled when the user clicks it. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_setDisableOnClick.htm)

methods.name: setImage
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this BBjButton method sets the image to display in the button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/bbjbutton_setimage.htm)

methods.name: setImageFile
methods.docu: Sets the icon to be displayed in the BBjButton. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_setImageFile.htm)

methods.name: setImageSize
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this BBjButton method sets the size of the button image. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_setImageSize.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalAlignment
methods.docu: In BBj 12.0 and higher, this method sets the BBjButton's vertical text alignment. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbutton/BBjButton_setVerticalAlignment.htm)

classes.name: BBjGroupBox
classes.docu:
The BBjGroupBox object provides methods for manipulating a GUI group 
 box control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjGroupBox.htm)

classes.name: BBjHtmlView
classes.docu:
The BBjHtmlView control displays HTML files, and can act as a complete embedded web browser, with support for HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. The BBjHtmlView can be configured through STBL options to be either an embedded WebKit browser using JavaFX, or an embedded Chromium-based browser. See STBL Options for BBjHtmlView below.
Access to the JAVAFX_HTMLVIEW and CHROMIUM_HTMLVIEW features requires an active Software Asset Management (SAM) subscription. See Benefits of ‘Software Asset Management' Feature Line.
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/bbjhtmlview.htm)

methods.name: setUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the URL associated with this BBjHtmlView. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/bbjhtmlview_seturl.htm)

methods.name: setUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method sets the URL associated with this BBjHtmlView. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/bbjhtmlview_seturl.htm)

methods.name: getUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this method returns the URL associated with this BBjHtmlView. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/bbjhtmlview_geturl.htm)

methods.name: getImage
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjImage corresponding to the contents of a BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_getImage.htm)

methods.name: getUserAgent
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method returns the user agent string for this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_getUserAgent.htm)

methods.name: setUserAgent
methods.docu: In BBj 15.0 and higher, this method sets the user agent string for this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_setUserAgent.htm)

methods.name: injectScript
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method injects the specified JavaScript into this BBjHtmlView control, making it available for subsequent use by BBjHtmlView::executeScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_injectScript.htm)

methods.name: injectScript
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method injects the specified JavaScript into this BBjHtmlView control, making it available for subsequent use by BBjHtmlView::executeScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_injectScript.htm)

methods.name: injectUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method injects the specified JavaScript URL into the HTML document of this BBjHtmlView control, making it available for subsequent use by client-side JavaScript, BBjHtmlView::executeScript, or BBjHtmlView::executeAsyncScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_injectUrl.htm)

methods.name: injectUrl
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method injects the specified JavaScript URL into the HTML document of this BBjHtmlView control, making it available for subsequent use by client-side JavaScript, BBjHtmlView::executeScript, or BBjHtmlView::executeAsyncScript. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_injectUrl.htm)

methods.name: executeScript
methods.docu: In BBj 16.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_executeScript.htm)

methods.name: executeScript
methods.docu: In BBj 16.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_executeScript.htm)

methods.name: executeAsyncScript
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjHtmlView control and returns immediately. In BBj 22.14 and higher, the return value is an integer index that will be included in a subsequent BBjExecuteScriptEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_executeAsyncScript.htm)

methods.name: executeAsyncScript
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjHtmlView control and returns immediately. In BBj 22.14 and higher, the return value is an integer index that will be included in a subsequent BBjExecuteScriptEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_executeAsyncScript.htm)

methods.name: executeAsyncScript
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjHtmlView control and returns immediately. In BBj 22.14 and higher, the return value is an integer index that will be included in a subsequent BBjExecuteScriptEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_executeAsyncScript.htm)

methods.name: getClientType
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the client type for this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_getClientType.htm)

methods.name: getClientVersion
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns the client version for this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_getClientVersion.htm)

methods.name: getAutoNavigate
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean that indicates whether the BBjHtmlView control should automatically navigate to anchor links that the user clicks on. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_getAutoNavigate.htm)

methods.name: setAutoNavigate
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method tells the BBjHtmlView control whether it should automatically navigate to anchor links that the user clicks on. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_setAutoNavigate.htm)

methods.name: print
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method brings up a print dialogue that enables the user to print the contents of the BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_print.htm)

methods.name: getDownloadDirectory
methods.docu: In BBj 20.30 and higher, this method returns the default download directory for this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_getDownloadDirectory.htm)

methods.name: setDownloadDirectory
methods.docu: In BBj 20.30 and higher, this method sets the default download directory for this BBjHtmlView control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmlview/BBjHtmlView_setDownloadDirectory.htm)

classes.name: BBjDataAwareGrid
classes.docu: The BBjDataAwareGrid object provides methods to manipulate the data-aware grid control in BBj. The BBjDataAwareGrid extends the BBjGrid object and therefore implements all the methods in BBjGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/BBjDataAwareGrid.htm)

methods.name: cancelSeekDialog
methods.docu:
In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method removes the seekDialog from user 
 display if it is currently being shown.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_cancelseekdialog.htm)

methods.name: convertToStandardGrid
methods.docu: Converts a BBjDataAwareGrid to a BBjStandardGrid.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_converttostandardgrid.htm)

methods.name: getInsertErrorMessage
methods.docu: Returns the message that is displayed in the insert error dialog box after an invalid insert is attempted in a BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getinserterrormessage.htm)

methods.name: getInsertMessage
methods.docu: Returns the message that is displayed in the confirm dialog box when an insertion is attempted in a BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getinsertmessage.htm)

methods.name: getRecord
methods.docu: Returns a record from the associated data file of a BBjDataAwareGrid object. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getrecord.htm)

methods.name: getShowInsertMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 2.01 and higher, returns whether the confirm insert message is being used in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getshowinsertmessage.htm)

methods.name: getShowUpdateMessage
methods.docu: Returns whether the confirm update message is being used in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getshowupdatemessage.htm)

methods.name: getUpdateBusyMessage
methods.docu: Returns the message that is displayed in the update busy dialog box when an attempt is made to update a locked record in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getupdatebusymessage.htm)

methods.name: getUpdateDeletedMessage
methods.docu: Returns the message that is displayed in the update deleted dialog after an update is attempted on a deleted record in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getupdatedeletedmessage.htm)

methods.name: getUpdateMessage
methods.docu: Returns the message that is displayed in the update confirm dialog after an update is attempted on a record in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_getupdatemessage.htm)

methods.name: insertRow
methods.docu: Inserts a row into the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_insertrow.htm)

methods.name: replaceCommasWhenDisplaying
methods.docu:
In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method replaces the 'thousands' separator 
 when displaying data in numeric cells of a given column.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_replacecommaswhendisplaying.htm)

methods.name: replaceCommasWhenSaving
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method replaces the 'thousands' separator when writing data from the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_replacecommaswhensaving.htm)

methods.name: replaceDecimalsWhenDisplaying
methods.docu:
In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method replaces the decimal character when 
 displaying data in numeric cells of a given column.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_replacedecimalswhendisplaying.htm)

methods.name: replaceDecimalsWhenSaving
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method the decimal character when writing data from the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_replacedecimalswhensaving.htm)

methods.name: seekLastRecord
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method seeks to the last record of the channel used to create the grid. While performing the seek, this method disables the BBjGrid and displays a dialog box to the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_seeklastrecord.htm)

methods.name: seekLastRecord
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method seeks to the last record of the channel used to create the grid. While performing the seek, this method disables the BBjGrid and displays a dialog box to the user. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_seeklastrecord.htm)

methods.name: setDataChannel
methods.docu: Sets the data channel which makes the BBjGrid data-aware. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setdatachannel.htm)

methods.name: setInsertErrorMessage
methods.docu: Sets the text used in the dialog box which is displayed when an attempt to insert a record into the BBjDataAwareGrid is not successful. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setinserterrormessage.htm)

methods.name: setInsertMessage
methods.docu: Sets the message displayed in the confirm dialog box after an insert is made in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setinsertmessage.htm)

methods.name: setShowInsertMessage
methods.docu: In BBj 2.01 and higher, sets whether to display a confirm insert dialog box after a change is made in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setshowinsertmessage.htm)

methods.name: setShowUpdateMessage
methods.docu: Sets whether to display a confirm update dialog box after a change is made in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setshowupdatemessage.htm)

methods.name: setUpdateBusyMessage
methods.docu: Sets the text used in the dialog box which appears when an attempt to update a record in the data-aware BBjGrid is unsuccessful because the record is being locked by another process. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setupdatebusymessage.htm)

methods.name: setUpdateDeletedMessage
methods.docu: Sets the text used in the dialog box which appears when an attempt to update a record in the data-aware BBjGrid is unsuccessful because the record has been deleted. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setupdatedeletedmessage.htm)

methods.name: setUpdateMessage
methods.docu: Sets the text used in the confirm update dialog box, displayed when a change is made in a row of data in the BBjDataAwareGrid. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_setupdatemessage.htm)

methods.name: undoRowEdit
methods.docu:
In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method resets all cells in the current row 
 to the values prior to when the user began editing the row.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/gridmethods/bbjdataawaregrid/bbjdataawaregrid_undorowedit.htm)

classes.name: BBjCEdit
classes.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, the BBjCEdit object provides methods for manipulating a GUI CEdit control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit.htm)

methods.name: getNumberOfParagraphs
methods.docu: Returns the number of paragraphs in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getnumberofparagraphs.htm)

methods.name: getCurrentParagraphIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 22 and higher, this method returns the current zero-based paragraph index in the BBjCEdit control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/BBjCEdit_getCurrentParagraphIndex.htm)

methods.name: addParagraph
methods.docu: Adds a paragraph to the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_addparagraph.htm)

methods.name: addParagraphs
methods.docu: Adds all paragraphs in the vector to the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_addparagraphs.htm)

methods.name: appendToParagraph
methods.docu: Appends text to the end of a paragraph in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_appendtoparagraph.htm)

methods.name: removeParagraph
methods.docu: Removes a paragraph in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_removeparagraph.htm)

methods.name: setMaxParagraphSize
methods.docu: Sets the maximum number of characters allowed in a BBjCEdit control paragraph. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setmaxparagraphsize.htm)

methods.name: getMaxParagraphSize
methods.docu: Returns the maximum number of characters allowed per paragraph in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getmaxparagraphsize.htm)

methods.name: getMaxLength
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method returns the maximum length of the text in a BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getmaxlength.htm)

methods.name: setMaxLength
methods.docu: In BBj 11.0 and higher, this method sets the maximum length of the text in a BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setmaxlength.htm)

methods.name: highlight
methods.docu: Highlights characters in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_highlight.htm)

methods.name: getTabSize
methods.docu: Returns the tab size of the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_gettabsize.htm)

methods.name: setTabSize
methods.docu: Sets the tab size of the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_settabsize.htm)

methods.name: getLineWrap
methods.docu: Returns whether lines are wrapped in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getlinewrap.htm)

methods.name: setLineWrap
methods.docu: Sets whether the lines will be wrapped in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setlinewrap.htm)

methods.name: setWrapStyleWord
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method sets the style of wrapping used if the BBjCEdit control is wrapping lines. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/BBjCEdit_setWrapStyleWord.htm)

methods.name: getWrapStyleWord
methods.docu: In BBj 19.0 and higher, this method gets the style of wrapping used if the BBjCEdit control is wrapping lines. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/BBjCEdit_getWrapStyleWord.htm)

methods.name: getDrawBorder
methods.docu: Returns whether a black border is drawn around the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getdrawborder.htm)

methods.name: setDrawBorder
methods.docu: Sets whether a black border is drawn around the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setdrawborder.htm)

methods.name: setVerticalScrollable
methods.docu: Sets whether a vertical scroll bar will appear when the text is too large to fit within the BBjCEdit control area. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setverticalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: getVerticalScrollable
methods.docu: Returns whether a vertical scroll bar will appear when the text is too large to fit within the BBjCEdit control area. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getverticalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: setHorizontalScrollable
methods.docu: Sets whether a horizontal scroll bar will appear when the text is too large to fit within the BBjCEdit control area. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_sethorizontalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: getHorizontalScrollable
methods.docu: Returns whether a horizontal scroll bar will appear when the text is too large to fit within the BBjCEdit control area. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_gethorizontalscrollable.htm)

methods.name: getLimitToOneParagraph
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjCEdit control is limited to one paragraph. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getlimittooneparagraph.htm)

methods.name: setLimitToOneParagraph
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjCEdit control is limited to one paragraph. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setlimittooneparagraph.htm)

methods.name: getOvertypeMode
methods.docu: Returns whether overtype mode is used in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getovertypemode.htm)

methods.name: setOvertypeMode
methods.docu: Sets whether the overtype mode is used in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setovertypemode.htm)

methods.name: getIgnoreTabs
methods.docu: Returns whether TAB key is ignored in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getignoretabs.htm)

methods.name: setIgnoreTabs
methods.docu: Sets whether to ignore the Tab key in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setignoretabs.htm)

methods.name: getIgnoreEnters
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns whether the ENTER key is ignored in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getignoreenters.htm)

methods.name: setIgnoreEnters
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method sets whether to ignore the ENTER key in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setignoreenters.htm)

methods.name: getParagraph
methods.docu: Returns the paragraph text in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getparagraph.htm)

methods.name: getSelection
methods.docu: Returns the selected text in the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getselection.htm)

methods.name: getLineCountLimit
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the maximum number of lines (paragraphs) that can be entered into the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getlinecountlimit.htm)

methods.name: setLineCountLimit
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method sets the maximum number of paragraphs (lines) that can be entered into the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_setlinecountlimit.htm)

methods.name: removeAll
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method removes all paragraphs from the BBjCEdit control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_removeall.htm)

methods.name: getAllParagraphs
methods.docu: In BBj 5.0 and higher, this method returns the text of all paragraphs from the BBjCEdit control in a BBjVector. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjcedit/bbjcedit_getallparagraphs.htm)

classes.name: BBjWebComponent
classes.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, the BBjWebComponent is a BBjControl that encapsulates a WebComponent or native HTML element in the BUI and DWC browser clients. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent.htm)

methods.name: clearCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method clears the callback routine for a specified BBjWebComponent event that was previously created using BBjWebComponent::setCallback. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_clearCallback.htm)

methods.name: clearCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method clears the callback routine for a specified BBjWebComponent event that was previously created using BBjWebComponent::setCallback. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_clearCallback.htm)

methods.name: executeAsyncScript
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjWebComponent and returns immediately with an integer index that will be included in a subsequent BBjExecuteScriptEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_executeAsyncScript.htm)

methods.name: executeAsyncScript
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjWebComponent and returns immediately with an integer index that will be included in a subsequent BBjExecuteScriptEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_executeAsyncScript.htm)

methods.name: executeAsyncScript
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjWebComponent and returns immediately with an integer index that will be included in a subsequent BBjExecuteScriptEvent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_executeAsyncScript.htm)

methods.name: executeScript
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjWebComponent.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_executeScript.htm)

methods.name: executeScript
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method executes the specified JavaScript in this BBjWebComponent.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_executeScript.htm)

methods.name: getHtml
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the HTML content of this BBjWebComponent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_getHtml.htm)

methods.name: getTagName
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns the tagName that was specified on creation of this BBjWebComponent.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_getTagName.htm)

methods.name: newEventOptions
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns a BBjWebEventOptions object that can be used to configure event callback options for a subsequent BBjWebComponent::setCallback. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_newEventOptions.htm)

methods.name: setCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method registers the callback routine for a specified BBjWebComponent event. These event type codes are defined by the individual web components.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setCallback.htm)

methods.name: setCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method registers the callback routine for a specified BBjWebComponent event. These event type codes are defined by the individual web components.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setCallback.htm)

methods.name: setCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method registers the callback routine for a specified BBjWebComponent event. These event type codes are defined by the individual web components.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setCallback.htm)

methods.name: setCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method registers the callback routine for a specified BBjWebComponent event. These event type codes are defined by the individual web components.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setCallback.htm)

methods.name: setHtml
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method sets the HTML content of this BBjWebComponent. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setHtml.htm)

methods.name: setSlot
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method moves a BBjControl into this BBjWebComponent. If a non-blank slot name is specified, the BBjControl is placed in the specified slot within the web component. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setSlot.htm)

methods.name: setSlot
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method moves a BBjControl into this BBjWebComponent. If a non-blank slot name is specified, the BBjControl is placed in the specified slot within the web component. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjWebComponent/BBjWebComponent_setSlot.htm)

classes.name: BBjControl
classes.docu:
The BBjControl object is the base object for all SysGui controls and 
 it provides methods for manipulating these controls.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl.htm)

methods.name: setCallback
methods.docu: This method registers the callback routine for a specified event of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setcallback.htm)

methods.name: setCallback
methods.docu: This method registers the callback routine for a specified event of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setcallback.htm)

methods.name: clearCallback
methods.docu: In BBj 2.01 and higher, this method unregisters the callback routine for a specified event of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_clearcallback.htm)

methods.name: getContextID
methods.docu: Returns the context ID of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getcontextid.htm)

methods.name: addPopupMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method adds a popup menu to the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_addpopupmenu.htm)

methods.name: setPopupMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 4.00 and higher, this method binds a pre-existing popup menu to the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setpopupmenu.htm)

methods.name: getPopupMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method retrieves a popup menu from the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getpopupmenu.htm)

methods.name: removePopupMenu
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method removes a popup menu from the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_removepopupmenu.htm)

methods.name: setText
methods.docu: Sets the text in the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_settext.htm)

methods.name: getText
methods.docu: Returns the text that appears in the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_gettext.htm)

methods.name: getBackColor
methods.docu: Returns the background color of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: setBackColor
methods.docu: Sets the background color for the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setbackcolor.htm)

methods.name: setForeColor
methods.docu: Sets the foreground (text) color for the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setforecolor.htm)

methods.name: getForeColor
methods.docu: Returns the foreground (text) color of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getforecolor.htm)

methods.name: setFont
methods.docu: Sets the font for the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setfont.htm)

methods.name: getFont
methods.docu: Returns the font of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getfont.htm)

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjControl is enabled or disabled. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_isenabled.htm)

methods.name: setEnabled
methods.docu: Sets whether the BBjControl is to be enabled. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setenabled.htm)

methods.name: setVisible
methods.docu: Sets whether or not the BBjControl is visible. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setvisible.htm)

methods.name: isVisible
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjControl is visible. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_isvisible.htm)

methods.name: setToolTipText
methods.docu: Sets the tooltip text for the BBjControl (also known as short cue in BBx). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_settooltiptext.htm)

methods.name: getToolTipText
methods.docu: Returns the tooltip text for the BBjControl (also known as short cue in BBx). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_gettooltiptext.htm)

methods.name: showToolTipText
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method shows the tooltip text for the BBjControl (also known as short cue in BBx). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_showToolTipText.htm)

methods.name: showToolTipText
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method shows the tooltip text for the BBjControl (also known as short cue in BBx). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_showToolTipText.htm)

methods.name: setShortCue
methods.docu: Sets the text that appears above the BBjControl when the mouse is positioned over the control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setshortcue.htm)

methods.name: getShortCue
methods.docu: Returns the tooltip text for the BBjControl (also known as short cue in BBx). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getshortcue.htm)

methods.name: setLongCue
methods.docu: Sets the text that appears in the status bar for the BBjControl when the mouse is positioned over the control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setlongcue.htm)

methods.name: getLongCue
methods.docu: Returns the text that appears in the status bar for the BBjControl when the mouse is positioned over the control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getlongcue.htm)

methods.name: isGrouped
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjControl is part of a keyboard navigation group, along with other BBjControls with contiguous control IDs. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_isGrouped.htm)

methods.name: setGrouped
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this method sets whether the BBjControl is part of a keyboard navigation group, along with other BBjControls with contiguous control ids. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setGrouped.htm)

methods.name: setCausesControlValidation
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method sets whether entering the BBjControl will trigger control validation on the control that previously had focus. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setcausescontrolvalidation.htm)

methods.name: getCausesControlValidation
methods.docu: In BBj 5.00 and higher, this method returns whether or not entering the BBjControl will trigger control validation on the control that previously had focus. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getcausescontrolvalidation.htm)

methods.name: getBeepOnValidationFailure
methods.docu: In BBj 21.10 and higher, this method returns whether a BBjControl will beep when the application calls accept(0) in response to a validation event. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getBeepOnValidationFailure.htm)

methods.name: setBeepOnValidationFailure
methods.docu: In BBj 21.10 and higher, this method sets whether a BBjControl should beep when the application calls accept(0) during validation. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setBeepOnValidationFailure.htm)

methods.name: setSize
methods.docu: Sets the size of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setsize.htm)

methods.name: getWidth
methods.docu: Returns the width of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getwidth.htm)

methods.name: getHeight
methods.docu: Returns the height of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getheight.htm)

methods.name: setLocation
methods.docu: Sets the location of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setlocation.htm)

methods.name: getX
methods.docu: Returns the X coordinate of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getx.htm)

methods.name: getY
methods.docu: Returns the Y coordinate of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_gety.htm)

methods.name: getScreenX
methods.docu: Returns the X coordinate of the BBjControl on the screen. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getscreenx.htm)

methods.name: getScreenY
methods.docu: Returns the Y coordinate of the BBjControl on the screen. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getscreeny.htm)

methods.name: setClientEdge
methods.docu: Sets the BBjControl to have a client (lowered) border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setclientedge.htm)

methods.name: getClientEdge
methods.docu: Returns whether the client (lowered) border is set for the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getclientedge.htm)

methods.name: setRaisedEdge
methods.docu: Sets the BBjControl to have a raised border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setraisededge.htm)

methods.name: getRaisedEdge
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjControl has a raised border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getraisededge.htm)

methods.name: setNoEdge
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method sets the BBjControl to have no border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setnoedge.htm)

methods.name: getNoEdge
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns whether the BBjControl has no border. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getnoedge.htm)

methods.name: setOpaque
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method sets the opaque property of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setopaque.htm)

methods.name: isOpaque
methods.docu: In BBj 3.00 and higher, this method returns the opaque property of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_isopaque.htm)

methods.name: focus
methods.docu: Sets the focus on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_focus.htm)

methods.name: getID
methods.docu: Returns the ID of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getid.htm)

methods.name: getControlType
methods.docu: In BBj 3.01 and higher, this method returns the control type of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getcontroltype.htm)

methods.name: destroy
methods.docu: This method destroys a control. It removes the BBjControl from the window and allows its ID to be used again. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_destroy.htm)

methods.name: setUserData
methods.docu: In BBj 3.01 and higher, this method associates an Object with the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setuserdata.htm)

methods.name: getUserData
methods.docu: In BBj 3.01 and higher, this method retrieves user data associated with the BBjControl using the method setUserData(). If setUserData() was not previously called on the control, then getUserData returns BBjNull. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getuserdata.htm)

methods.name: setCursor
methods.docu: In BBj 10.00 and higher, this method sets the cursor style on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setcursor.htm)

methods.name: getName
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method returns the name of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getname.htm)

methods.name: setName
methods.docu: In BBj 6.00 and higher, this method sets the name of a BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_setname.htm)

methods.name: addStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method adds a CSS style name to the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_addstyle.htm)

methods.name: removeStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method removes a CSS style name from the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_removestyle.htm)

methods.name: clearStyles
methods.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method clears CSS styles from the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_clearstyles.htm)

methods.name: getStyles
methods.docu: In BBj 11.00 and higher, this method gets a list of all CSS style names that have been added to the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/bbjcontrol_getstyles.htm)

methods.name: setStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method sets a CSS property on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setStyle.htm)

methods.name: getStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns the value of a CSS property explicitly set on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getStyle.htm)

methods.name: getComputedStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns the resolved value of a CSS property currently in effect on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getComputedStyle.htm)

methods.name: unsetStyle
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method unsets a CSS property on the control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_unsetStyle.htm)

methods.name: setAttribute
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method sets a control attribute on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setAttribute.htm)

methods.name: getAttribute
methods.docu: In BBj 15.00 and higher, this method returns a control attribute for the BBjControl previously set with BBjControl::setAttribute. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getAttribute.htm)

methods.name: removeAttribute
methods.docu: In BBj 22.13 and higher, this method removes a control attribute.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_removeAttribute.htm)

methods.name: putClientProperty
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method sets a client property on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_putClientProperty.htm)

methods.name: getClientProperty
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method returns a client property previously set on the BBjControl with BBjControl::putClientProperty. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getClientProperty.htm)

methods.name: setProperty
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method sets a property on the control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setProperty.htm)

methods.name: setProperty
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method sets a property on the control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setProperty.htm)

methods.name: getProperty
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns a client property previously set with BBjControl::setProperty. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getProperty.htm)

methods.name: getProperty
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method returns a client property previously set with BBjControl::setProperty. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getProperty.htm)

methods.name: getParentWindow
methods.docu: In BBj 17.00 and higher, this method returns the parent BBjWindow of the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getParentWindow.htm)

methods.name: getClassList
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method returns a BBjVector containing all CSS class names currently defined on this BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_getClassList.htm)

methods.name: addClass
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method adds a CSS class name to the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_addClass.htm)

methods.name: removeClass
methods.docu: In BBj 23.00 and higher, this method removes a CSS class name from the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_removeClass.htm)

methods.name: toggleClass
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this method toggles a CSS class name on the BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_toggleClass.htm)

methods.name: setSlot
methods.docu: In BBj 24.11 and higher, this method moves a child BBjControl into a parent BBjControl that's assumed to be a web component. If a non-blank slot name is specified, the child BBjControl is placed in the specified slot within the parent BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setSlot.htm)

methods.name: setSlot
methods.docu: In BBj 24.11 and higher, this method moves a child BBjControl into a parent BBjControl that's assumed to be a web component. If a non-blank slot name is specified, the child BBjControl is placed in the specified slot within the parent BBjControl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/SysGui/bbjcontrol/BBjControl_setSlot.htm)

classes.name: RecordSetBindable
classes.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, any BBjControl that supports binding to a BBjRecordSet implements the RecordSetBindable. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_RecordSetBindable/interface_recordsetbindable.htm)

methods.name: bindRecordSet
methods.docu: In BBj 4.0 and higher, this method binds the RecordSetBindable to a particular field from a BBjRecordSet. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_RecordSetBindable/interface_recordsetbindable_bindrecordset.htm)

classes.name: BBjBarChart
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, the BBjBarChart control displays data in a bar chart format. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart.htm)

methods.name: setBarValue
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets a bar value for a specified series and category. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_setbarvalue.htm)

methods.name: setTitle
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the title on the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_settitle.htm)

methods.name: getTitle
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns the title of the chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_gettitle.htm)

methods.name: getSeriesCount
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns the series count of the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/BBjBarChart_getSeriesCount.htm)

methods.name: setSeriesCount
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the series count of the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/BBjBarChart_setSeriesCount.htm)

methods.name: getCategoryCount
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns the category count of the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/BBjBarChart_getCategoryCount.htm)

methods.name: setCategoryCount
methods.docu: In BBj 19.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the category count of the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/BBjBarChart_setCategoryCount.htm)

methods.name: setSeriesName
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the name of the series on the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_setseriesname.htm)

methods.name: setCategoryName
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the name of a category on the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_setcategoryname.htm)

methods.name: setXLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the label that is to be displayed along the X-axis of the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_setxlabel.htm)

methods.name: getXLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns the X-axis label of the chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_getxlabel.htm)

methods.name: setYLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method sets the label that is to be displayed along the Y-axis of the bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_setylabel.htm)

methods.name: getYLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns the Y-axis label of the chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_getylabel.htm)

methods.name: is3D
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns if this chart was created in 3D mode. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_is3d.htm)

methods.name: isLegendShown
methods.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, this BBjBarChart method returns true if the legend will be shown on this chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/bbjbarchart_islegendshown.htm)

methods.name: setLegendShown
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method specifies whether this BBjBarChart should show a legend. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjbarchart/BBjBarChart_setLegendShown.htm)

classes.name: Injectable
classes.docu: In BBj 8.0 and higher, a BBjControl implements the Injectable interface if the control has the setInjectString and getInjectString methods, corresponding to the INJECT Mnemonic. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Injectable/Interface_Injectable.htm)

methods.name: getInjectString
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method returns the string value set with either the INJECT Mnemonic or the setInjectString method. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Injectable/Interface_Injectable_getInjectString.htm)

methods.name: setInjectString
methods.docu: In BBj 14.0 and higher, this method corresponds to the INJECT Mnemonic. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Injectable/Interface_Injectable_setInjectString.htm)

classes.name: BBjPrintPreview
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, the BBjPrintPreview object provides methods for previewing print jobs. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview.htm)

methods.name: scrollUp
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method scrolls the print preview area up. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_scrollup.htm)

methods.name: scrollDown
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method scrolls the print preview area down. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_scrolldown.htm)

methods.name: getZoom
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method sets the zoom amount for the pages being displayed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_getzoom.htm)

methods.name: setZoom
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method sets the zoom amount for the pages being displayed. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_setzoom.htm)

methods.name: getIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method gets the index of the currently displayed page. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_getindex.htm)

methods.name: setIndex
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method sets the index of the currently displayed page. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_setindex.htm)

methods.name: getPageCount
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method gets the page count of the print job. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_getpagecount.htm)

methods.name: firstPage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method shows the first page of the print job. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_firstpage.htm)

methods.name: lastPage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method shows the last page of the print job. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_lastpage.htm)

methods.name: previousPage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method shows the previous page of the print job. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_previouspage.htm)

methods.name: nextPage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method shows the next page of the print job. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_nextpage.htm)

methods.name: twoPage
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method uses a two page layout. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_twopage.htm)

methods.name: fitToHeight
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method uses all available height to display the page. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_fittoheight.htm)

methods.name: fitToWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjPrintPreview method uses all available width to display the page. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjprintpreview/bbjprintpreview_fittowidth.htm)

classes.name: BBjTabCtrl
classes.docu: The BBjTabCtrl object provides methods for manipulating a GUI tab control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/BBjTabCtrl.htm)

methods.name: setSelectedIndex
methods.docu: Sets a tab in the BBjTabCtrl to be selected. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_setselectedindex.htm)

methods.name: setEnabledAt
methods.docu: Specifies whether a tab is to be enabled in the BBjTabCtrl [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_setenabledat.htm)

methods.name: isEnabledAt
methods.docu: Returns whether a tab is enabled in the BBjTabCtrl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_isenabledat.htm)

methods.name: isMultiLine
methods.docu: Returns whether the BBjTabCtrl adjusts its tabs into multiple lines. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_ismultiline.htm)

methods.name: setMultiLine
methods.docu: Specifies whether the BBjTabCtrl should adjust its tabs into multiple lines. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_setmultiline.htm)

methods.name: setNumTabs
methods.docu: Sets the number of tabs in the BBjTabCtrl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_setnumtabs.htm)

methods.name: getNumTabs
methods.docu: Returns the number of tabs in the BBjTabCtrl. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjtabctrl/bbjtabctrl_getnumtabs.htm)

methods.name: removeTab

classes.name: BBjHtmlEdit
classes.docu:
In BBj 16.0 and higher, the BBjHtmlEdit control implements a rich text editor backed by HTML. Setting the STBL("!OPTIONS") JAVAFX_HTMLEDIT option to TRUE makes the BBjHtmlEdit control in the Java Swing GUI client use JavaFX (if available). In this configuration, the BBjHtmlEdit uses an embedded WebKit browser, with support for HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. In BBj 19.0 and higher, setting the STBL("!OPTIONS") CHROMIUM_HTMLEDIT option to TRUE makes the BBjHtmlEdit control in the Java Swing GUI client use a Chromium engine (if available). In this configuration, the BBjHtmlEdit uses an embedded Chromium-based web browser, with support for HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. In BBj 23.00 and higher, the default editor component for the BUI and DWC browser clients is TinyMCE. Setting the STBL("!OPTIONS") CKEDITOR_HTMLEDIT option to TRUE makes the BBjHtmlEdit control in the BUI and DWC browser clients use the original CKEditor 4 editor component. This is a temporary convenience; CKEditor 4 is no longer supported as of June 2023.

Access to the JAVAFX_HTMLEDIT and CHROMIUM_HTMLEDIT features requires an active Software Asset Management (SAM) subscription. See Benefits of ‘Software Asset Management' Feature Line.

[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjhtmledit/BBjHtmlEdit.htm)
