methods.docu: Sets the segments in the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_setsegments.htm)

methods.name: getSegments
methods.docu: Returns the segments of the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_getsegments.htm)

methods.name: setMinimumHeight
methods.docu: Sets the minimum height of the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_setminimumheight.htm)

methods.name: setTextAt
methods.docu: Sets the text of a segment in the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_settextat.htm)

methods.name: getTextAt
methods.docu: Returns the text of a segment in the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_gettextat.htm)

methods.name: getRectangle
methods.docu: Returns the dimensions of a segment in the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_getrectangle.htm)

methods.name: getBorders
methods.docu: Returns the border widths of the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_getborders.htm)

methods.name: getLengthAt
methods.docu: Returns the border widths of the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_getlengthat.htm)

methods.name: getSegmentCount
methods.docu: Returns the number of segments in the BBjStatusBar control. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/bbjstatusbar_getsegmentcount.htm)

methods.name: setAlignmentAt
methods.docu: Sets the horizontal alignment of a segment in the BBjStatusBar control.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjstatusbar/BBjStatusBar_setAlignmentAt.htm)

classes.name: BBjInputTSpinner
classes.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, the BBjInputTSpinner object provides a spinner on a BBjInputT.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner.htm)

methods.name: getNextTime
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method returns the time that the spinner would return, in BBx TIM format, if pressing the spin up button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_getNextTime.htm)

methods.name: getPreviousTime
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method returns the time that the spinner would return, in BBx TIM format, if pressing the spin down button. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_getPreviousTime.htm)

methods.name: getMaximumTime
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method returns the maximum time of the spinner in BBx TIM format. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_getMaximumTime.htm)

methods.name: setMaximumTime
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method changes the maximum time to which the spinner will spin, specified in BBx TIM format. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_setMaximumTime.htm)

methods.name: getMinimumTime
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method returns the minimum time of the spinner in BBx TIM format. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_getMinimumTime.htm)

methods.name: setMinimumTime
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method changes the minimum time to which the spinner will spin, specified in BBx TIM format. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_setMinimumTime.htm)

methods.name: getSpinField
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method returns the field signifying how much the spinner will spin on an up or down button.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_getSpinField.htm)

methods.name: setSpinField
methods.docu: In BBj 24.00 and higher, this BBjInputTSpinner method specifies whether the spinner will spin by hours, minutes, seconds, or milliseconds.[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/BBjInputTSpinner/BBjInputTSpinner_setSpinField.htm)

classes.name: Focusable
classes.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, a BBjControl implements the Focusable interface if the user can focus the control via either the mouse or keyboard.
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Focusable/interface_focusable.htm)

methods.name: isFocusable
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, isFocusable returns a value indicating whether or not the user can focus the control.
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Focusable/interface_focusable_isfocusable.htm)

methods.name: setFocusable
methods.docu:
In BBj 6.00 and higher, setFocusable sets whether a control can be focused.
[Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_Focusable/interface_focusable_setfocusable.htm)

classes.name: TextAlignable
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, a BBjControl implements the TextAlignable interface if the control allows the text to align left, right, or center. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjinterfaces/IF_TextAlignable/interface_textalignable.htm)

classes.name: BBjLineChart
classes.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, the BBjLineChart control displays data in a line chart format. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart.htm)

methods.name: setSeriesName
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method sets the name of a series on the line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_setseriesname.htm)

methods.name: setXYValue
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method adds the X-Y point to the specified series (line). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_setxyvalue.htm)

methods.name: setTitle
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method sets the title on the line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_settitle.htm)

methods.name: getTitle
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method sets the title of the line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_gettitle.htm)

methods.name: setXLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method sets the label that is to be displayed along the X-axis of the line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_setxlabel.htm)

methods.name: getXLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method returns the X-axis label of the line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_getxlabel.htm)

methods.name: setYLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method sets the label that that is to be displayed along the Y-axis of the line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_setylabel.htm)

methods.name: getYLabel
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method returns the Y-axis label of this line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_getylabel.htm)

methods.name: isLegendShown
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this BBjLineChart method returns true if the legend will be shown on this line chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/bbjlinechart_islegendshown.htm)

methods.name: setLegendShown
methods.docu: In BBj 19.10 and higher, this method specifies whether this BBjLineChart should show a legend. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjlinechart/BBjLineChart_setLegendShown.htm)

classes.name: BBjDrawPanel
classes.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, the BBjDrawPanel is the drawing surface associated with a BBjWindow. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel.htm)

methods.name: clearDrawing
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method erases all drawn objects from the BBjDrawPanel and covers the window (except any visible controls or child windows) with the current background color or the specified background color. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_clearDrawing.htm)

methods.name: clearDrawing
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method erases all drawn objects from the BBjDrawPanel and covers the window (except any visible controls or child windows) with the current background color or the specified background color. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_clearDrawing.htm)

methods.name: drawArc
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws an open arc or closed pie slice on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawArc.htm)

methods.name: drawArrow
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a line on the BBjDrawPanel from the current pen position to the position defined by x,y, like BBjDrawPanel::drawLineTo, but also places an optional arrow head at either or both ends. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawArrow.htm)

methods.name: drawEllipse
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a closed curve (ellipse or circle) on the BBjDrawPanel that fits just inside a rectangle delimited by the coordinates given. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawEllipse.htm)

methods.name: drawImage
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a BBjImage on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawImage.htm)

methods.name: drawLine
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a line on the BBjDrawPanel from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2) using the current pen settings. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawLine.htm)

methods.name: drawPoint
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a point at (x,y) on the BBjDrawPanel using the current pen color. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawPoint.htm)

methods.name: drawPolygon
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a polygon on the BBjDrawPanel using the current pen settings. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawPolygon.htm)

methods.name: drawPolyline
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a series of lines on the BBjDrawPanel connecting the specified points using the current pen settings. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawPolyline.htm)

methods.name: drawRect
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws a rectangle on the BBjDrawPanel using the current pen and BBjDrawPanel::setRound settings. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawRect.htm)

methods.name: drawText
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method draws the specified text starting at position (x,y) on the BBjDrawPanel using the current text color and font. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_drawText.htm)

methods.name: getDrawPanelImage
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns a BBjDrawPanel as a BBjImage. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getDrawPanelImage.htm)

methods.name: getFillColor
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the color for filled drawn objects on the BBjDrawPanel, including rectangles, pie slices, and polygons. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getFillColor.htm)

methods.name: getFillType
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the current fill type for closed objects on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getFillType.htm)

methods.name: getPattern
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the current BBjDrawPanel pen pattern. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getPattern.htm)

methods.name: getPenColor
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the pen color for drawn lines, arrows, and outlines of drawn objects on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getPenColor.htm)

methods.name: getPenWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns the width of the BBjDrawPanel drawing pen. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getPenWidth.htm)

methods.name: getTextColor
getTrack
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method returns a boolean indicating whether BBjDrawPanelitems will be resized when the window is resized. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getTrack.htm)

methods.name: moveTo
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method moves the BBjDrawPanel pen to the specified point without making a mark on the drawing surface. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_moveTo.htm)

methods.name: pop
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method restores the most recent BBjDrawPanelstate that was saved using BBjDrawPanel::push(). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_pop.htm)

methods.name: push
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method saves the current BBjDrawPanel state. That state can later be restored using using BBjDrawPanel::pop(). [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_push.htm)

methods.name: setBackColor
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the background color for BBjDrawPanel::drawText and for cross-hatched BBjDrawPanel::setFillType. This also sets the default background color for BBjDrawPanel::clearDrawing. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setBackColor.htm)

methods.name: setDrawMode
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the BBjDrawPanel drawing mode. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setDrawMode.htm)

methods.name: setDrawUnits
setEnableRepaint
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets whether BBjDrawPanel updates should be applied immediately. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setEnableRepaint.htm)

methods.name: setFillColor
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the color for filled drawn objects on the BBjDrawPanel, including rectangles, pie slices, and polygons. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setFillColor.htm)

methods.name: setFont
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method sets the font to be used by BBjDrawPanel::drawText. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setFont.htm)

methods.name: getFont
methods.docu: In BBj 22.10 and higher, this method returns the font that will be used by BBjDrawPanel::drawText. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_getFont.htm)

methods.name: setFillType
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the fill type for closed objects on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setFillType.htm)

methods.name: setOpaque
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets text to be opaque or transparent. Text plotted to the BBjDrawPanel using BBjDrawPanel::drawText may be rendered in different ways, depending on the BBjDrawPanel::setOpaque setting. Text can be opaque (the BBjDrawPanel::setBackColor color is plotted in a rectangle behind the text) or transparent (objects behind the text can be seen in the spaces between the letters). Text is not resized if the drawing is resized (the text is not scaled), so that a 10-point font will always be shown as a 10-point font, regardless of changes to the drawing surface. However, opaque text may be scaled, if desired. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setOpaque.htm)

methods.name: setPattern
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the pen pattern for lines and outlines of objects drawn on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setPattern.htm)

methods.name: setPenColor
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the pen color for lines and outlines of objects drawn on the BBjDrawPanel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setPenColor.htm)

methods.name: setPenWidth
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the width of the BBjDrawPanel drawing pen. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setPenWidth.htm)

methods.name: setRound
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this setting can be used to round the corners of subsequent BBjDrawPanel::drawRect rectangles drawn on the BBjDrawPanel. The rounded corner may be symmetrical (xradius = yradius) or it may be a 90-degree segment of an ellipse. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setRound.htm)

methods.name: setScribble
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method toggles scribble mode on the draw panel. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setScribble.htm)

methods.name: setTextColor
methods.docu: In BBj 16.0 and higher, this method sets the color of text drawn to the BBjDrawPanel using BBjDrawPanel::drawText. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjdrawpanel/BBjDrawPanel_setTextColor.htm)

classes.name: BBjChart
classes.docu: In BBj 7.00 and higher, BBjChart is an abstract class that acts as the base class for BBjCommonChart and BBjGenericChart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchart/bbjchart.htm)

methods.name: getClientChart
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method returns a client object that represents the client-side bar chart. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchart/bbjchart_getclientchart.htm)

methods.name: getClientChartPanel
methods.docu: In BBj 18.00 and higher, this method returns a ClientObject that delegates to the underlying JFreeChart ChartPanel . This ClientObject can be used to perform more advanced operations with JFreeCharts. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchart/BBjChart_getClientChartPanel.htm)

methods.name: writePNGToServer
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method creates a PNG image of the BBjChart and writes it to a file on the server. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchart/bbjchart_writepngtoserver.htm)

methods.name: writePNGToServer
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method creates a PNG image of the BBjChart and writes it to a file on the server. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchart/bbjchart_writepngtoserver.htm)

methods.name: writePNGToServer
methods.docu: In BBj 7.0 and higher, this method creates a PNG image of the BBjChart and writes it to a file on the server. [Docs](https://documentation.basis.cloud/BASISHelp/WebHelp/bbjobjects/Window/bbjchart/bbjchart_writepngtoserver.htm)
